Доходы Анаркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнес – деятельности за счет увеличение КРС.
texts.en: Anara is 50 years old, married and has one son.  To provide a source of income for her family, she became involved in animal husbandry and farming.  The business, started with 2,000 KGS in 1994, now yields about 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and meat products and farming.  Today, her business contains six cows.  In order to further develop her business, Anara requested a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy cattle.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further expansion of her business by increasing the quantities of cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Bahridin

texts.ru: Бахридин занимается животноводством. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Бахридин в основном закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. В этот раз он берет кредит для закупа бычков с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Bahridin is involved in animal husbandry.  He breeds cattle at home.  Bahridin primarily buys livestock for subsequent resale.  This time, he is requesting a loan to buy bulls in order to increase livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy bulls in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Bahodir

texts.ru: Баходир проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Баходира портниха, мать пенсионерка. Баходир занимается животноводством. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности Баходир занимается пятнадцать лет. Он берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота и корма.
texts.en: Bahodir lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 43 years old, married and has three children.  Bahodir's wife is a seamstress, and his mother is a retiree.  Bahodir is involved in animal husbandry.  He earns a living by breeding cattle.  Bahodir has been in this business for fifteen years.  He is requesting this loan to buy cattle and livestock feed.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Maranatha De Samarie Group

texts.fr:
Mireille est la coordinatrice de son groupe Maranatha de Samarie. Elle habite dans la région de Samarie d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Elle a dirigé son commerce de vente de Produit Divers pendant les 7 dernières années. Elle est marie et elle a fils.

Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l'achat de divers produits tels que les chaussures, cosmétiques, produits de nettoyage. Des autres membres du groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre des produits alimentaires, cosmétiques, vêtements, chaussureset du charbon. Mireille dit que son défi principal est en mesure de vendre plus depuis la crise économique en Haïti ne reçoit pas beaucoup d'argent.
texts.en:
Mireille is the coordinator of her group, Maranatha de Samarie. She lives in the region of Samarie in Haiti, where electricity is rarely available and the water supply extremely limited. Mireille has been managing a business selling various products for the past seven years. She is married and has a son.

Mireille would like to use this loan to purchase various items such as shoes, cosmetics and cleaning products. Other members of the group need a loan to help with their businesses, in which they sell items such as food products, cosmetics, clothing, shoes and charcoal. Mireille says that her main challenge is to be able to sell more; since the economic crisis in Haiti, there has not been much money.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Cursina

texts.es:
Cursina de 55 años, es una mujer soltera. Vive en la casa de su hija en un distrito de la selva central.
Cursina es una mujer laboriosa. Desde que sus hijos se independizaron empezó a trabajar con esmero en su taller de carpintería. 
Lleva más de 15 años en esta actividad. Empezó fabricando pequeños muebles como mesas, sillas, cómodas y otros. Con los años de experiencia consiguió contratar personas quienes la ayudan a construir carrocerías de camiones, y muebles más grandes.
“El negocio es rentable, más aún si son muebles y carrocerías, se gana muy bien”, menciona orgullosa de sus logros.
Se siente contenta trabajando con sus compañeras porque así cree que sus metas pueden lograrse con facilidad.
Sus metas próximas son ampliar su negocio, para ello necesita adquirir más materia prima. Por eso solicita de su apoyo. Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP. Se siente contenta por el apoyo anterior y por la oportunidad de pertenecer a un banco comunal “Rosas y Claveles”, muy unido. Menciona que pagará las cuotas con puntualidad.
Invertirá el dinero en la compra de maderas de los árboles: Nogal, Cedro, Moena y Roble, que son las más utilizadas en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Cursina is 55 years old. She is single and lives in her daughter's house, located in the central jungle district.

She is a very hardworking woman. For the last 15 years, since her children became independent, Cursina has worked painstakingly in her carpentry workshop. She started out making furniture such as tables, chairs, and dressers. With years of experience, she was able to contract workers to help her to build truck bodies and other bigger pieces of furniture. 

"This business is profitable, even more so for furniture and coachwork, which earn a lot," says the proud owner of her accomplishments. Cursina is very happy to work alongside those she does because she believes they help her to accomplish her goals more easily. Her next goal is to expand her business, which she needs more raw materials to do. That is why she is requesting this loan. Cursina will invest this money to purchase wood from a variety of trees that she uses most often in her work: oak, cedar, walnut, and moena.

This is Cursina's second loan from MFP. She pledges to make her repayments punctually. She is very happy to have their support and the opportunity to belong to the tight-knit communal bank "Rosas y Claveles" (Roses and Carnations).

loans.use: to buy wood from various trees: walnut, cedar, and oak, and moena (found in Peru)

loans.name: Firdavs

texts.ru: Фирдавс 27 - летний женатый мужчина проживающий в районе Хамадони. Он занимается животноводством. Фирдавс в основном занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается почти год. Фирдавс берет кредит для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Fidras is a 27 year-old man who lives Hamadoni. He works in animal husbandry. Fidras mainly breeds cattle, and has been doing this type of work for almost a year. Fidras is requesting a loan to purchase some bulls and calves.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and calves.

loans.name: Dilnoza

texts.ru: Дилноза трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Потому что она выросла в хорошей семье. Благодаря родителям, она получила среднее образование и хорошее воспитание. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. С детства она любила шить и поэтому, повзрослев, она стала портнихой. Дилноза мастер своего дела и умеет шить с собственным дизайном. Это прекрасная портниха решила реализовать свое ремесло в сфере бизнеса и получать от этого доход. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес услугой портнихи, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она будет открывать свой швейный цех не далеко от своего дома. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  5000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Если она будет получать доход от бизнеса, то будет использовать для улучшения условия проживания. Будущим она имеет очень большие планы и есть на это вероятность, что она станет успешной бизнес леди. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilnoza is hardworking and kind woman, because she grew up in a good family. Thanks to her parents, she received a high school education and a good upbringing. She is married and is raising one child. She has loved to sew ever since she was little, and so when she grew up, she became a dressmaker. Dilnoza runs her own business and knows how to sew her own designs. This outstanding dressmaker decided to take her trade into the commercial sphere and earn a living from it. With this goal in mind, she took a course organized by the Association of Businesswomen entitled "Achieve Success", and received a certificate. Now she is fully able to organize her own business and become successful. She wants to organize a dressmaking service, since she has experience in this area. She is going to open her own sewing shop near her home. She is asking for a loan in the amount of 5000 somonis to purchase a sewing machine to start the new business. If the business makes money, she will use it to improve her living conditions. She has big plans for the future, and it is certain that she will become a successful business woman. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Verónica Alexandra

texts.es:
La Sra. Verónica es una persona joven con gran valentía para enfrentar los desafíos, ella se define como una persona humilde, honrada, luchadora que ama a su única hija de 11 años, ella trabaja con su hermana, una chica joven, la cual sale en la foto de impacto.  Juntas buscan la manera de salir adelante y de mejorar su calidad de vida

El crédito solicitado a Fodemi se lo empleara en la adecuación del restaurante y en la compra de productos como arroz, papas, aceite que son necesarios para la preparación de desayunos. Almuerzos y meriendas que verónica ofrece a sus clientes. 


El sueño que la Sra. Verónica tiene es el tener un restaurante mucho más grande, con cocinas industriales, verónica esta consiente que cumplir su sueño es posible, pero para cumplirlo tiene que trabajar día a día, la motivación para cumplir este sueño es ver a su hija crecer.
texts.en:
Verónica is a young person with great courage to face challenges.  She defines herself as a humble, honest and determined person who loves her only daughter who is 11 years old.  She works with her sister, a young girl, who appears in the snapshot.  Together they look for the way to get ahead and to improve their quality of life.

The loan requested from Fodemi will be employed in the upgrading of the restaurant and in the purchase of products like rice, potatoes and oil that are necessary for the preparation of breakfast, lunch and snacks that Verónica offers her customers.

Verónica’s dream is to have a much larger restaurant with industrial kitchens.  She is conscious that to fulfill her dream is possible but in order to do so she has to work day by day.  The motivation for fulfilling this dream is seeing her daughter grow up.

loans.use: to invest in upgrading her restaurant and to purchase necessary products such as "quintales" (100 lbs.) of rice, potatoes and oils.

loans.name: Djiby

texts.fr: Monsieur Djiby  qui loge à environ 22 km de la ville principale, s’active dans l’agriculture depuis plus de 10 ans. C’est un jeune célibataire  très actif qui vit de son activité. Il vient tout juste d’ouvrir un compte pour pouvoir bénéficier d’un crédit qui lui permettra d’acheter une moto pompe de marque ROC  afin d’améliorer son activité de maraichage. Avec les revenus de son activité il peut appuyer aux charges de la maison et à la dépense quotidienne. Il a comme ambition, d’acheter d’autres motopompes dans le cadre de toujours maximiser son profit.
texts.en: Djiby, who lives about 22 km from the main city, has been a farmer for more than 10 years. This is a very active young single man who lives off his business. He just opened an account to be able to benefit from a loan which will allow him to buy a ROC brand motor-pump in order to improve his market gardening business. With the income from his business he can support the responsibilities of the home and the daily expenses. His ambition is to buy other motor-pumps within the framework of always maximizing his profits.

loans.use: to buy a motor-pump for his market gardening business.

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.fr:
Jean Claude est marié et a 38 ans. Il fait le commerce des livres chrétiens (librairie).  Il a 4 enfants, le plus âgé a 12 ans et le moins âgé a 4 ans. Trois de ses enfants vont à l’école et aucune autre personne n’est en sa charge.
Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est de 3 ans de l’éducation secondaire.
Il a débuté de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2009. Le cycle actuel est le dixième pour lui.
Avec ce crédit, il va augmenter la quantité qu’il vend en achetant 500 livres chrétiens de différentes natures.
Il n’attend aucune difficulté de non remboursement.
Comme stratégie, il va améliorer sa collaboration avec des églises, ce lui permettra de vendre ses livres à travers des églises.
Son ambition est de voir toutes les églises ainsi que leurs membres acheter des livres dans son librairie. Pour sa famille, il va assurer l’éducation de ses enfants ainsi que les soins médicaux.
A part de l’activité financée, Monsieur Jean Claude est électronicien.Il fait aussi le commerce des téléphones et leurs accessoires.
texts.en:
Jean Claude is married and is 38 years old. He sells Christian books in a bookstore. He has 4 children. The oldest is 12 years old and the youngest is 4 years old. Three of his children go to school and he has no other dependents.

He was born in Rwanda and his level of education is 3 years of secondary school.

He started collaborating with ACB Ltd. in 2009. The current cycle is his tenth.

With this loan, he is going to increase the quantity that he sells by buying 500 Christian books of different types.

He doesn't expect any difficulties repaying the loan.

As a strategy, he is going to improve his collaboration with churches, which will allow him to sell his books through the churches.

His ambition is to see all the churches as well as their members buy books in his bookstore. For his family, he is going to ensure his children's education as well as their medical care.

Aside from his financed business, Jean Claude is an electrician. He also sells telephones and their accessories.

loans.use: to buy books.

loans.name: Anith

texts.es:
Anith, de 40 años, es una mujer  alegre, soñadora y emprendedora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su hijo de 15 años a quien quiere dar una buena educación y mejor calidad de vida.
El trabajo de Anith consiste en  el diseño, confección  y venta de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños. Realiza esta actividad en un local en el interior de su vivienda, y ya lleva 12 años ejerciendo esta actividad. Comenta que se inicio a este trabajo debido a la necesidad de generar ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos de los estudios de su hijo. Ahora lo realiza junto a unas amigas a quienes contrata cada vez que tiene pedidos en grandes cantidades. Considera rentable éste negocio, pues las empresas solicitan sus servicios en la confección de uniformes para sus trabajadores, asimismo tiene contratos con los distintos colegios de la ciudad. Ella para emprender tuvo que solicitar un crédito a la institución bancaria, con este dinero compró su primera maquina de coser. Espera en el futuro abrir un taller que se dedique a la confección de vestidos de novia. Por tanto éste será su préstamo número 15 con la institución MFP, tiene ganas de seguir siendo puntual en su cuotas, porque le esta yendo muy bien. Con el monto solicitado de 3,000 soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como telas, blondas, elásticos, hilos para seguir confeccionando y  produciendo; también comprará una remalladora para el acabado de sus confecciones.
texts.en:
Anith is 40 years old and a cheerful, ambitious, and enterprising woman. She lives in her own home with her 15-year-old son, for whom she wants to provide a good education and a better quality of life. Anith works as a designer and seamstress who sells clothing for women, men, and children. She operates her business from a workshop in her home. Anith has been managing her business for 12 years. She says that she started in this line of work because she needed to generate income to pay for her son’s educational expenses. Anith now works with a few friends she hires whenever she receives several large orders. She believes her business is profitable since companies request her sewing services whenever they need employee uniforms. Anith also has contracts with various schools within the city. She started her business by requesting a loan from a financial institution. Anith used the money to buy her first sewing machine. In the future, she hopes to open a shop that is dedicated to making wedding gowns.

This will be her 15th loan with MFP. She wants to continue being punctual with her loan payments, which explains why she is doing very well. The loan she requested in the amount of 3,000 PEN will be invested in the purchase of materials such as fabrics, lace, elastics, and thread so that she can continue sewing and producing. Anith will also buy a stitching machine for adding the finishing touches to her designs.

loans.use: to buy a stitching machine, fabrics, lace, elastics, and thread.

loans.name: Tohirjon

texts.en: Tohirjon is married and has four children. He is a person who always tries to earn money in order to provide a better life to his children. Tohirjon began his own business dealing in animal husbandry seven years ago. He has requested a loan in the amount of 500 USD to increase the number of animals he has for sale. He hopes for Kiva's cooperation in this loan since it will be used to improve his family's income.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Manzura

texts.en:
Manzura is one of the smart members of her family who lives happily but poorly. She is 49 years old and has a lovely husband who went to Russia to find a job. They are bringing up four children. Manzura tries to provide them with a high quality living condition. With this aim, eight years ago she began her own business with selling of ‘kuraga’. She has a garden full of apricot trees. There are more than 70 trees bearing apricots. She collects the apricots, dries them and sells as ‘kuraga’ to local people. 

The developing side of her business is connected to her harvest. This season she had a small harvest, which is why she wants to buy additional ‘kuraga’ to make full her business assets and continue selling her goods. Her income is small and she can’t do it without additional capital. She is asking for a loan of 500 USD to buy ‘kuraga’ to develop her business. Each month she will make her payment on time. She will be happy for your support.

loans.use: To buy ‘kuraga’ for developing business

loans.name: Muharam

texts.en:
Muharam is 41 years old, married, and has 2 children. She owns a clothes store, which is based in the local market. Here she sells women's clothes and has a lot of customers as she renews her assortment every season. 

To improve business, she is borrowing the amount from Imon International organization to buy women's clothes for the new winter season. She’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding her business before long.

loans.use: To buy women's clothes for the winter season

loans.name: Jamol

texts.en: Jamol is a hardworking man. He is married and has two children. In order to provide his family with all necessary things, eight years ago he began his own business dealing with farming. He grows onions, wheat and grapes. Also he is a builder and gets enough income. He wants to comfort his family with good living conditions. With this aim he is beginning to repair his house but he doesn't have money to buy paint and other building materials. He is asking for a loan of 400 USD to buy building materials to repair his house. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair his house

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: Bineta est une femme célibataire qui évolue depuis 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce. Elle gère une boutique et vend des produits alimentaires  et divers. Elle commence sa journée de travail à 7h et la termine a 00h. Grâce aux revenus que lui procure son activité elle parvient a satisfaire certains besoins personnels et prend en charge la location de la boutique ou elle exerce son activité. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC ou elle a déjà remboursé 06 prêts antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits qu’elle commercialise dans sa boutique. D’autre part elle souhaite acheter de fournitures scolaires qu’elle va revendre car elle a l’intention de diversifier les produits qu’elle offre a sa clientèle dans l’objectif de mieux développer son activité de commerce et accroitre ses revenus. Elle souhaite dans le futur voyager pour importer des marchandises pour les besoins de son commerce.
texts.en:
Bineta is a single woman who has been doing business for 10 years.  She runs a boutique that sells food products, among other things.  She begins her workday at 7:00am and closes at 12:00am.  Thanks to the profits she earns from her business, she is able to satisfy her own needs and pay the rent for the shop where she does business.

She is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches, where she has already repaid six previous loans.  She is asking for a credit of 400,000frs in order to purchase products for resale in her boutique.  Additionally, she hopes to buy school supplies that she will resell since she intends to start diversifying the products that she offers to her clientele; the objective is to best develop her business and to bolster her income.  In the future, she hopes to travel for the purpose of importing merchandise for her business.

loans.use: to purchase food items and school supplies for resale.

loans.name: Allia

texts.en: Allia is a 49-year-old married woman who has three family members and comes from Sahab, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for her home improvements. She wants to repaint her home and to do maintenance on the home. She hopes in the future to buy new furniture.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Nael's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois est créé depuis le 19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 21 membres qui habitent dans la même localité. Ces membres sont solidaires entre eux et vivent dans la bonne entente. Elles ont comme activité principale le commerce, l'embouche et la restauration.
Nael, âgée de 49 ans, est debout à droite de la photo la main levée. Elle est mariée et mère de 09 enfants dont 04 garçons et 05 filles. Sa principale activité est l'embouche bovine. Avec le prêt, elle achète un bœuf qu'elle élève au bout de 06 mois, elle le revend dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle fait aussi de la restauration comme activité parallèle. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 10 ans. Après avoir acheté le bœuf, avec le restant de l'argent, elle achète des ustensiles pour renflouer sa gargote.
Les bénéfices lui permettent d'entretenir sa famille et participe à la scolarisation des enfants. Elle s'en sert aussi pour augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was created on November 19, 2004.  It is made up of 21 members who live in the same locality.  They support each other in a spirit of solidarity and they live in good harmony.  Their main activity is retail business, the fattening of livestock and the preparation of meals.

Nael, age 49, is standing on the right-hand side in the photo and raising her hand.  She is married and the mother of nine children (four boys and five girls).  Her main activity is the fattening of cattle.  She is using her loan to buy an ox which she will raise for six months and then resell at a weekly market.  Additionally, Nael prepares meals.  She has been involved in this activity for ten years.  After buying the ox, she will use the rest of her money to buy utensils for her food booth.

Her profits allow her to provide for her family, to contribute to her children's education, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to fatten up cattle.

loans.name: Ndieme's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois abritant ce grouoe est créé depuis le  19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 11 membres qui habitent la même localité et vivant dans une belle harmonie. Leurs principales activités sont le commerce, la restauration et l'embouche.
Marème est mariée et mère de 02 garçons. Âgée de 26 ans, elle est debout à droite de la photo la main levée. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Elle achète 15 cartons de savon et un sac de savon en poudre qu'elle revend au détail. Elle fait aussi une activité parallèle à savoir la restauration. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 2010. Après avoir réapprovisionner son stock de commerce, elle utilise l'argent qui reste pour renforcer son activité parallèle.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de pourvoir au bien-être de sa famille (scolarisation, santé, nourriture) et d'augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois overseeing this group was created on November 19, 2004.  It is made up of 11 members who reside in the same locality and live in good harmony with each other.  They are primarily involved in retail business, in the preparation of meals, and in the fattening of livestock.

Marème is married and the mother of two boys.  She is 26 years old and standing on the right-hand side in the photo, raising her hand.  Her main activity is retail business.  She buys 15 boxes of soap and one bag of soap powder and then resells her goods for retail.  Additionally, she also prepares meals.  She has been involved in this type of activity since 2010.

After replenishing her stock of goods, she uses the rest of her money to strengthen her second business.  Her profits allow her to ensure her family's well-being (children's education, healthcare, food needs) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy soap.

loans.name: Gueye's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 28 décembre 2009. Il est composé de membres qui habitent la même localité. La solidarité et l'entraide prévalent dans le quartier.
Rockhaya, âgée de 55 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée à mère de 05 enfants, deux garçons et 03 filles. Elle fait de la tannerie.
Avec le prêt, elle compte acheter des peaux de moutons, de chèvres ou de bœufs (1500 peaux par mois à 500 F l'unité) qu'elle tanne pour ensuite les vendre au cordonniers.
Avec les bénéfices, elle améliore le quotidien de sa famille; paie la scolarité des enfants et leur habillement, mais aussi ces bénéfices vont lui permettre de payer ses intérêts et d'augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created the December 28, 2009. It is composed of members who all live in the same area. Solidarity and mutual support prevail in their neighborhood. 

Rockhaya, standing on the right side of the photo with her hand raised, is 55 years old and married. She is the mother of 5 children, 2 boys and 3 girls. 

Rockhaya is a tanner. With this loan, she hopes to buy sheep, goat, or cow skins (1,500 skins per month a 500 francs each) that she will tan and then sell to shoemakers. 

With the profits, she will improve the life of her family and pay for her children's schooling and their clothing. The profits will also allow her to pay the interest [on the loan] and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy animal skins to tan and sell

loans.name: Faty's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 28 décembre 2009. Les 27 membres habitent pour la plupart le même quartier. Elle s'entendent bien et la majeur partie fait le petit commerce.
Faty, âgée de 22 ans,debout à droite de la photo et la main levée, est mariée sans enfant. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Avec son prêt, elle compte faire du petit commerce. Elle achète des accessoires d'habillement pour homme, femme et enfant qu'elle revend. Elle s'approvisionne dans les grandes villes ou elle peut trouver une dizaine de robes pour enfants à 2500 F l'article; 08 paires de chaussures à 3000 F la paire.
Avec les bénéfices, elle compte renforcer son capital pour préparer son prochain prêt.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 28, 2009. The 27 members live for the most part in the same district, and they get along well. Most of them have small businesses.

Faty, 22 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is married and without children. Her main work involves commerce. With this loan, she intends to work in small-scale commerce.  She is buying some clothing accessories for men, women, and children that she resells. She gets her supplies  from the big cities where she can find a dozen dresses for children at 2,500 francs each and 8 pairs of shoes at 3,000 francs a pair.

With the profits, she plans to increase her capital, so as to prepare for her next loan.

loans.use: to purchase clothing accessories for men, women, and children to sell

loans.name: Binta's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 21 décembre 2009. Il est composé de 33 femmes membres qui entretiennent de très bonnes relations.
Coudy, âgée de 51 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 05 enfants; 03 garçons et 02 filles. Sa principale activité est le commerce de beignet. Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'acheter de la farine, de l'huile et des ingrédient pour prépares des beignets qu'elle revend dans son village.
Les bénéfices vont lui permettre d'améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille et à la scolarisation des enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 21, 2009. It is composed of 33 women, who enjoy very good relations with one another.

Coudy, aged 51, is standing to the right and raising her hand in the picture. She is married and a mother of five children, three boys and two girls. Her main business is the retail of fritters. Her new loan will allow her to buy flower, oil and other ingredients to prepare fritters, which she resells in her village. 

Profits will allow her to improve her family’s living conditions and to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy flower, oil and other ingredients to prepare fritters to sell

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé le 28 décembre 2009. Il est composé de membres du même quartier qui entretiennent de très bonne relations et dont le commerce est leur activité principale.
Khady, âgée de 59 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est mariée et mère d'un enfant de 20 ans. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Avec le prêt, elle compte acheter des chaussures pour enfants et adultes. Elle achète pour 20 paires de chaussures adultes à 1500 F la paire et 15 paires de chaussures enfants à 900 F la paire.
Avec les bénéfices, elle compte augmenter son épargne pour parer à certaines éventualités et aussi pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 28, 2009. It is composed of members from the same district who maintain very good relations. Their main work involves commerce. 

Khady, 59 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of one child, who is 20 years old. Khady's main work involves commerce. With this loan, she intends to purchase shoes for children and adults. She is purchasing 20 pairs of adult shoes at 1,500 francs a pair and 15 pairs of children's shoes at 900 francs a pair.

With the profits, she plans to increase her savings to fend off certain eventualities and also to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes to sell

loans.name: Afaf

texts.en: Afaf is a 30-year-old married woman from Jarash, Jordan, who has three family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to buy women's and children's clothes to sell to her friends and neighbors in the area. She wants to expand her business. She also wants to open a shop to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy women's and children's clothes to resell.

loans.name: Mariama's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 21 décembre 2009. Les 48 membres qui le compose habitent le même quartier et s'entendent très bien.
Dieynaba, âgée de 39 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Elle vend du Pain, du niébé, du mil et de l'arachide. Elle fait aussi une activité parallèle à savoir de l'embouche ovine. Elle achète 02 moutons pour les élever et ensuite les revendre.
Avec les bénéfices récoltés, elle envisage d'inscrire ses enfants au collège et subvenir à leur bien être social.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 21, 2009. The 48 members composing it live in the same district and get along very well together. 

Dieynaba, 39 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of seven children. Her main work involves commerce. She sells bread, black-eyed peas, millet, and peanuts. She also has a parallel business, namely the fattening of sheep. She is purchasing two head of sheep to raise and then resell. 

With the profits earned, she envisions sending her children to middle school and supporting their well-being.

loans.use: to operate small businesses

loans.name: Nassara's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 21 décembre 2009. La majeur partie de ses membres habitent le même quartier et entretiennent de très bonnes relations.
Dambo, âgée de 51 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Sa principale activité est l'embouche (bovine, ovine et caprine). Elle pratique cette activité depuis des années. 
Avec son crédit, elle compte acheter un bœuf qu'elle va élever pour ensuite le revendre d'ici quelques mois.
Les bénéfices récoltés vont lui permettre d'aider son mari dans les charges domestiques; de même, elle prévoit d'acheter un moulin.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 21. 2009. The majority of its members live in the same district  and maintain good relations.

Dambo, 51 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of seven children. Her main work involves fattening animals (cattle, sheep, and goats). She has been in this business for years. With her loan, she intends to purchase a steer that she will raise and then resell a few months from now. 

The profits earned will enable her to help out her husband to cover domestic expenses; and also, she plans on purchasing a mill or grinder.

loans.use: to raise animals to sell

loans.name: Maïmouna's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois abritant ce groupe est créé le 28 décembre 2009. Il est composé de 48 membres qui habitent la même localité. Ces membres entretiennent de bonnes relations et sont solidaires entre eux.
Aminata, âgée de 34 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 02 garçons et 03 filles.
Avec le prêt, elle compte renforcer son échoppe. Elle achète 10 sacs de lait en poudre, 02 sacs de sucre en poudre qu'elle va revendre au détail. Elle achète aussi une barrique de mil à 20000 F pour confectionner du thiacri, qu'elle va revendre.
Avec les bénéfices générés, elle contribue à l'entretien des enfants et améliore le quotidien de la famille. Les bénéfices lui permettent aussi de payer ses intérêts et de renflouer son épargne.
Les trois femmes en médaillons étaient absentes lors de la prise de la photo.
texts.en:
The 'banc villageois' that houses this group was created on December 28, 2009. It comprises 48 members who live in the same town. These members maintain good relationships and mutually support one another. 

Aminata, 34 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of five children (2 boys and 3 girls). With this loan, she intends to bolster her shop. She is purchasing 10 bags of powdered milk and 2 bags of powdered sugar that she is going to sell retail. She is also purchasing a barrel of millet for 20,000 francs to make 'thiacri' which she is going to sell.

With the profits, she helps to care for the children and improve day-to-day family life. The profits will also enable her to pay the loan interest and to grow her savings.

loans.use: to bolster her shop

loans.name: Dua'a

texts.en:
Dua'a is a 22-year-old married woman from Nao'or, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to buy materials for making  bread to sell in the same neighborhood. She wants to increase her products. She hopes in the future to expand her project. 
Since Dua'a is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy materials for making  bread  to sell

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe créé depuis le 17 mai 1997 est composé des membres du village et des villages environnants. Les membres vivent dans la bonne entente et la convivialité et sont très solidaire entre elles. Leurs principales activités sont l'embouche et le commerce.
Amy, âgée de 38 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est mariée et mère de 06 enfants dont 04 garçons et 02 filles et un autre enfant en charge. Sa principale activité est l'embouche bovine. Elle fait cette activité depuis 03 cycles. 
Avec le prêt, elle achète 01 veau qu'elle élève, arrivé à maturité, elle le revend dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle achète aussi un mouton qu'elle élève pour ensuite le revendre. Avec ce qui reste de l'argent, elle fait une activité parallèle à savoir le petit commerce.
Après avoir payer son prêt, les bénéfices lui permettent de s'occuper du bien être de ses enfants, de la reconstruction de sa maison et participe dans la dépense quotidienne de la famille.
texts.en:
This group, in existence since May 17, 1997, is composed of individuals living in the same village or nearby. They have a good rapport, maintaining friendly relations and supporting each others. Their main line of work is raising livestock and vending.

Amy, 38 years old (the one standing on the right raising her hand in the photo), is married and mother of six: four sons and two daughters. She also has one other child in her care. Her main line of work is raising sheep. She has completed three cycles already.

With this loan, she [will] buy one calf to raise and, once it reaches maturity, to sell at the weekly market. She will also buy a sheep to fatten and resale. She will use the remainder of the funds for her  work as a vendor, an additional business activity. After paying off her loan, she will have a profit allowing her to take care of her children, repair her house and contribute to everyday family expenses.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Ena Mercedes

texts.es: Ena  tiene 45 años de edad está divorciada de su conyugue, Tiene 1 hijo de 8 años de edad que estudia en una escuela pública del sector por donde viven. Ella es una mujer luchadora y da gracias a Dios que aunque  su hijo no tiene un padre ella lo  ha criado con mucho cariño. Ena a pesar de ser madre soltera nunca le ha faltado nada a su hijo. Por eso ella tiene un negocio que es la venta comida. Ena  trabaja  todos los días de 6:00am hasta 15:00pm Su meta es tener su local propio arreglar su casa. Con el préstamo ella quiere Comprar carnes, víveres, condimentos etc.Su sueño es poderle dar una vida mejor su hijo
texts.en: Ena, 45, is divorced from her spouse.  She has an eight year old son who attends an elementary school in the sector they live in.  She comments that she’s been a hardworking woman and thanks to God she’s raised her son with much love even though he has no father.  She comments that her son has never lacked anything.  For this reason she has a food business.  Ena works every day from 6am until 3pm.  Her goal is to have a locale of her own and to improve her house.  She will use the loan to buy meat, foodstuffs, condiments, etc. Her dream is to give a better life to her child.

loans.use: to buy meat, foodstuffs, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Agath's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois qui abrite ce groupe a vu le jour le 19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 06 membres habitant la même localité et vivant dans la bonne entente. Leurs principales activités sont le commerce, l'embouche et la restauration.
Oumy, 37 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 02 garçons et 05 filles. Elle gère son magasin où elle vend de l'alimentation générale. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 1996. Le prêt lui permet de renflouer son magasin en achetant de nouveaux produits. Elle fait comme activité parallèle de l'embouche porcine. Avec ce qui reste de l'argent, elle achète de porcins qu'elle élève et au bout de 05 mois, les revends sur le marché.
Les bénéfices  générés vont servir à la scolarisation de ses enfants et aussi au bien-être de la famille.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois (Village Lending Group) that houses this group was started on November 19, 2004. It is made up of six members living in the same area who get along. Their principal activities are sales, livestock fattening, and food service.
Oumy, 37 years old, standing up at the right of the photo and raising her hand, is married and mother of 7 children (2 boys and 5 girls). She runs her store where she sells general grocery products. She has been in this business since 1996. The loan will allow her to replenish her store by buying new products. Concurrent with running this business, she practices pork fattening. With the remainder of the money, she will buy pigs which she will raise up to five months and resell them at the market.
The profits generated will be used for her children's education and the family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to replenish her store.

loans.name: Anta's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est créé depuis le 03 décembre 2007 Il est composé par des femmes qui habitent le même village et aux alentours.Elles font comme activité principale le commerce d'habits .Anta âgée de 37 ans est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont 04 garçons et 02 filles. Elle est debout sur la photo et levant la main gauche.Avec le prêt reçu elle compte acheter des habits qu'elle revend auprès de ses clients dans les villages environnants, elle s'active dans le commerce de niébé d'arachide, des haricots elle mène cette activité depuis 06 ans. Les bénéfices lui permettent de prendre en charge la famille puisque son mari est en Italie.
texts.en: This group was created on December 3, 2007. It is made up of women who live in the same village and its environs. As a business, they mainly sell clothing. Anta, 37 years old, is married and mother of six children (four boys and two girls). She is standing up in the photo and raising her left hand. WIth the loan, she counts on buying clothing that she will resell to customers in the nearby villages. She works selling cowpeas and beans and has been in this business for six years. The profits will allow her to take care of her family since her husband is in Italy.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Alma Rosa

texts.es: La solicitante señora Alma Rosa tiene poco que se quedo viuda, cuenta con un hijo que adoptaron ella y su esposo el cual se quedo bajo su responsabilidad. Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder colocar  el techo a un cuarto ya que va ser de cemento para que sea más duradero y seguro, por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora. La señora Alma Rosa tiene un negocio de venta de productos de belleza por cataloga con sus vecinas y familiares, en coacciones sale a vender en diferentes partes de la ciudad. Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio será para pagar el crédito, ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para darle lo mejor a su hijo. Desea mejorar la calidad de vida y que su hijo tenga su propio espacio en la casa. Espera contar nuevamente con su cooperación ya que ha tenido tres créditos con Kiva los cuales ha tenido un buen historial de pagos.
texts.en:
Ms. Alma Rosa recently became a widow.  She has one adopted son, who she is still responsible for.  She is requesting this loan to buy a roof for a room to make it more durable and safe.  She currently does not have enough money to finish this job.  

Ms. Alma Rosa operates a business selling beauty products from a catalog with her neighbors and family members, and occasionally she goes to other parts of the city.  Part of the profits she obtains from her business will be used to pay this loan, and she uses the rest of the profit to give the best to her son.  She hopes to improve the quality of life for her son so that he can have his own space in the house.  She hopes to receive another loan with lender support, since she has had three Kiva loans, and has always had a good repayment history.

loans.use: Colocación de un techo de concreto

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es:
Freddy es un hombre de 24 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, él es una persona muy alegre, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, Freddy no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las orillas de un rio cercano a su vivienda y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Gracias al apoyo de sus padres, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Freddy trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con una mototaxi de la cual es chofer, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque conoce las zonas donde encontrar mayor cantidad de clientes.
Freddy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder hacer el tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de piso a su hogar; de esta manera Freddy tendrá su vivienda en mejores condiciones, más adecuadas y seguras, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para que junto con su familia pueda salir adelante.
texts.en:
Freddy is a 24-year-old man, is single, and lives in the city of Camaná. He is a very happy, hardworking and enthusiastic person, who has a great desire for improvement. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to work to support his parents, Freddy was not able to study a professional career, but he would really have liked to be able to do so. In his spare time he likes to walk by the banks of a river near his house, and on some occasions cooks a delicious Lomo Saltado [a traditional stir-friend beef dish] to share with his family.

Thanks to the support of his parents, with much determination and dedication, Freddy works offering transportation services. He has a motorcycle taxi which he drives. Everyday from the early hours of the morning he goes out to travel around the streets of his city looking for passengers. He can work approximately 12 hours daily, and believes that his business is doing well because he knows the areas in which to find a larger number of customers.

Freddy is very grateful for the Kiva loans, as thanks to the help offered he will be able to improve his house. He wants to be able to do the cementing, painting and placing of the flooring in his home, and in this way his home will be in better, more adequate and safer conditions. In this way he will continue working and making an effort so that he can get ahead together with his family.

loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Gandong Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe vient d'être créé (ce 10 Octobre 2012) avec un effectif de 35 femmes. Elles habitent le même quartier avec une bonne relation de voisinage. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce de produits divers.
Mme Adèle est l'emprunteur en vedette du groupe. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite avec la main levée. Cette dame est âgée de 57 ans, mariée et mère de 02 garçons. Elle a également une fille adoptive en sa charge.
Mme Adèle compte acheter de la mire pour une valeur de 45.000 frs (50 litres à 900 frs l'unité) et payer 5.000 frs pour le transport sur Dakar. Elle les vend à 2.500 frs le litre.
Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle compte aider son époux à la prise en charge des enfants, pour la scolarité, la santé et la nourriture.
texts.en:
This group was created on the 10th of October, 2012, with a membership of 35 women. They live in the same area and have good neighbourly relationships. Their main business is the retail of various products.

Adèle is the group's featured borrower. She is the one standing on the right of the picture with her hand raised. She is 57 years old, married and the mother of 2 boys. She also has an adopted daughter in her charge.

Adèle plans to buy a quantity of myrrh worth 45 000 francs (50 litres at 900 francs per litre) and pay 5 000 francs for the transportation to Dakar. She will resell it at 2 500 francs per litre. She plans to use the profits generated by her business to help her husband take care of the children's education, health and food expenses.

loans.use: to buy myrrh for resale in Dakar.

loans.name: Nafi's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois qui abrite ce groupe est inauguré le 28 septembre 2012. Il est composé de 27 femmes qui sont issues de la même localité et ont comme principales activités le commerce,l'agriculture et l'élevage; le groupe PC 1 est constitué de vingt sept femmes.


L'emprunteur vedette Madame Nafi est une femme mariée âgée de 44 ans, elle est mère de 8 enfants dont le plus jeune a 8 ans, elle a aussi une petite fille de 3ans. Elle est matrone dans la case de santé du village,elle capitalise une bonne expérience de plusieurs années;elle fait parallèlement de l'embouche ovine.Debout à droite de la photo, elle est vêtue en blanc fleurettes jaunes et a levé la main gauche.


Avec son prêt Nafi  compte acheter 2 moutons pour embouche ovine et espère les revendre 4 à 5 mois après pour préparer son remboursement.  

Elle participe aux dépenses familiales (scolarité, habillement, nourriture, santé) pour soutenir son mari.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois (Village Lending Group) that houses this group was founded on September 28, 2012. It is made up of 27 women from the same area who work mainly in sales, agriculture and livestock fattening; the group PC 1 is made up of 27 women.
The featured borrower Madame Nafi is a 44 year old married woman. She is the mother of eight children, the youngest of whom is eight. She also has a granddaughter who is three years old. She is the house mother at the outpost health clinic in the village and she has several years of experience. She  practices sheep fattening concurrently. Standing up at the right of the photo, she is dressed in white and yellow flowers and is raising her left hand. 
With her loan, Nafi counts on buying two sheep for fattening and hopes to resell them four or five months later to prepare for her repayment.
She participates in the family spending (school fees, clothing, food, health) to support her husband.

loans.use: to buy two sheep for fattening

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois est inauguré le 03-12-2007. Le groupe représente 36 membres.Elles habitent la même localité et sont en bonne entente.

La présidente du groupe, Fatimata Ousmane, est une femme mariée de 64 ans. Elle a un de ses enfants et cinq autres en sa charge. Elle fait du petit commerce. Elle vend de l'arachide, haricot,du mil etc... Elle s'approvisionne au marché de Guéoul les lundi et jeudi. Sur la photo, elle est à droite et a levé sa main gauche.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter des marchandises pour accroître ses bénéfices et un mouton pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari pour les charges familiales et épargne pour atteindre une autonomie.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was created on December 3, 2007.  It is made up of 36 members who live in the same locality and get along well with each other.

The group's leader, Fatimata Ousmane, is a 64-year-old married woman.  She takes care of one of her children, as well as five other children.  

Fatimata Ousmane is involved in small retail business.  She sells groundnut, beans, millet etc..  She stocks up at the Guéoul market on Mondays and Thursdays.  In the photo, she is standing on the right-hand side, raising her left hand.

With her loan, she will buy various goods, which will help her to boost her profits.  She will also purchase a sheep for fattening up.

She uses her profits to support her husband in taking care of the family expenses.  Thanks to her profits, she also saves some money and hopes to reach financial autonomy.

loans.use: to buy various goods and livestock for fattening.

loans.name: Falla's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de Sop Serigne Bara est créé le jour de l'inauguration 21 septembre 2012. Il est composé de cinquante femmes issues du même quartier et leurs activités dominantes sont le petit commerce, la restauration, l'élevage,la couture,crochet, broderie.
Madame Khoudia la responsable est âgée de 30 ans, elle est mariée mère de 04 enfants dont 02 garçons et 02 filles , elle s'active dans le petit commerce de niébé, elle fait parallèlement le travail de relais de santé au poste de santé de la localité; elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine qu'elle pratique depuis belle lurette. Elle est debout sur la photo à droite et a levé sa main gauche. Son prêt lui servira d'acheter du niébé et c'est une activité qui lui rapporte beaucoup de revenus. Ses bénéfices obtenus lui permettent de se prendre en charge et d'épargner au niveau du BV.
texts.en:
The Sop Serigne Bara group was inaugurated on the 21st of September, 2012. It is made up of 50 women who come from the same area and whose main businesses include retail, restaurants, livestock breeding, sewing, crochet and embroidery services.

Khoudia, the group leader, is 30 years old. She is married and the mother of 4 children (2 boys and 2 girls). She sells black-eyed peas and also works as a health advisor in the local health centre. She has a good experience in her line of work, which she has been doing for a long time. She is standing on the right of the picture with her left hand raised. Her loan will be used to buy black-eyed peas, a business which generates a lot of revenue for her. The profits she makes allow her to be self-sufficient and to build some savings with the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy black-eyed peas.

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr: Le groupe est créé le jour de l'inauguration le 28 septembre 2012, il regroupe trente cinq femmes qui sont unies par des liens d'amitié et habitent le même village, elles mènent diverses activités le petit commerce, l'artisanat et l'élevage. Mariama la responsable est âgée de 39 ans, mariée elle est mère de 3 enfants de sexe masculin, elle mène une activité d'embouche ovine avec une expérience moyenne.Elle est debout tout à fait à droite sur la photo . Son prêt lui servira à acheter 02 moutons afin de gagner beaucoup de revenus. Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices épargner dans le BV.
texts.en:
This group was inaugurated on the 28th of September, 2012. It brings together 35 women who are united by bonds of friendship and live in the same village. They have various businesses; retail, crafts and livestock breeding.

Mariama, the group leader, is 39 years old. She is married and the mother of 3 male children. She has a sheep-fattening business and has moderate experience in the field. She is standing on the far right of the picture. Her loan will be used to buy 2 sheep so that she can earn a large income. She wishes to use her profits to build her savings with the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Sainte Therese Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe est créé le 04 décembre 2007, il est composé de femmes venant de différents quartiers de la ville mais sont unies par affinité, amitié et par confiance. Elles s'activent dans diverses activités telles que le petit commerce, la couture,  l'élevage.Le groupe PC est composé de 17 femmes.
Madame Emilie est âgée de 41 ans, mariée elle est mère de 04 enfants dont 1 garçon et 03 filles, elle s'active dans la vente de friperie, de la beurre de karité ,capitalise une bonne expérience de plusieurs années. Sur la photo elle est debout à droite. Son prêt lui permettra de satisfaire la clientèle et se faire beaucoup de revenus. Avec les bénéfices obtenus Emilie appui son mari dans la scolarisation et la santé de la famille; elle renforce aussi son épargne et gère ses petits besoins.
texts.en:
This group was created on the 4th of December, 2007. It is made up of women who come from different parts of town but who are united by affinity, friendship and trust. Their businesses include retail, sewing services and livestock breeding. The PC group is made up of 17 women.

Emilie is 41 years old, married and the mother of 4 children (one boy and 3 girls). She sells second-hand clothing and shea butter, and benefits from several years of good experience. She is standing on the right of the picture.

Emilie's loan will enable her to satisfy her clientèle and to earn a large income. She uses the profits she makes to help her husband take care of the family's education and health. She also builds up her savings and covers her own small needs.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Ramatoulaye's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois dont fait partie ce groupe a a été mis en place le 19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 06 membres qui habitent dans la même localité. Elles entretiennent de bonnes relations et sont solidaires entre elles. Leurs principales activités sont le commerce, l'embouche et la restauration.
Sokhna, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 73 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 01 garçon et 06 filles. Sa principale activité est le commerce, activité qu'elle pratique cela fait environ 20 ans. 
Avec le prêt, elle compte  acheter des sacs de choux, de carottes et d'aubergine pour renforcer son commerce de légumes et avec ce qui reste de l'argent, elle va acheter 02 sacs de friperie qu'elle va écouler dans les marchés hebdomadaires.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de renflouer son épargne et de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
The banc villageois, to which this group belongs, was created on the 19th of September, 2004. The group is made up of 6 members who live in the same village. They enjoy good relationships with each other and are supportive of one another. Their main businesses are retail, livestock-fattening and the restaurant business.

Sokhna, standing on the right of the photo and raising her hand, is 73 years old. She is married and the mother of 7 children, 1 boy and 6 girls. Her main business is retail, a line of work she has been in for around 20 years. She plans to use this loan to buy bags of cabbages, carrots and aubergines, so that she can strengthen her vegetable-selling business. She will use the remainder of the money to buy 2 bags of second-hand clothing which she will sell at the weekly markets. The profits she makes enable her to increase her savings and meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani is a 26 year old married female from Sahab in Jordan. She has 2 children and has requested a 1,200 JOD loan to buy woman and children clothes to resell for her friends and neighbors in the same of area. In the future, Tahani is planning to obtain a large room for storing the clothes she sells and improve the living conditions of her family.

Since Tahani is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Dania Regina

texts.es: La joven Dania de 26 años de edad, estudio técnico en computación, es soltera, trabajo con su padre en el negocio pero el fallece y ella se queda a cargo del negocio de Cyber café desde hace 3 años, al comienzo fue muy difícil para ella al adquirir esta responsabilidad y sacarlo adelante fue un proceso duro pero hoy en día le gusta y lo tiene todo controlado, ahora ella apoya a su mama y desea que en un futuro poder hacer más grande el local parar cuando se case y nazcan sus hijos darles todas las condiciones necesarias para su bienestar. Este primer crédito lo necesita para hacer mejoras en la infraestructura del negocio desea realizar de concreto una pared de madera que con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando, comprara bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, estribo, alambre de amarre y el pago de la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Dania is a single young woman of 26 years of age.  She studied computer technology and worked with her father in the business, but he died and she has been in charge of the cyber cafe business for 3 years.  To begin with, it was very difficult for her to assume this responsibility, and taking the business forward was a painstaking process.  Now, however, she enjoys it and has everything under control.  She now supports her mother and hopes that, in the future, she will be able to extend the premises so that, when she marries and has children, she can provide the necessary conditions for their well-being.  

Dania needs this initial loan to make improvements to the business premises.  She wants to concrete over a wooden wall which has deteriorated over time and will buy breeze-blocks, cement, sand, iron, wall supports and fastening wire.  She will also use the loan to pay her workforce.

loans.use: To buy breeze-blocks, cement, sand, iron, wall supports and fastening wire, and to pay her workforce.

loans.name: Celia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Celia de 39 años de edad, de familia agricultora, dedicada por completo a esta labor, su esposo ahora trabaja como albañil y con ese ingreso se apoyan para los gastos del hogar, sus hijos gracias a dios continúan estudiando a pesar de los obstáculos que tuvieron de la falta de financiamiento para la agricultura pero que poco a poco fue adquiriendo préstamo y pagando a tiempo sus cuotas, ahora ella solicita su octavo crédito para darle mantenimiento a una manzana de piña comprando abono, urea e insecticidas para ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes, para un futuro aumentar a dos manzanas sus siembras de piñas y así obtener más ganancias para ayudar a la familia.
texts.en:
Celia is 39 years old, from a farming family, and completely dedicated to this work. Her husband now works as a construction worker and with this income they support each other with the household expenses. Thanks to God her children are continuing their studies, despite the obstacles that they faced due to the lack of funding for farming. However, little by little they acquired loans and repaid their installments on time. 

Today Celia is requesting her eighth loan to maintain a plot of land sown with pineapples by buying fertilizer, urea and insecticides. This will allow her to offer better products to her customers, and in the future to augment her sowing of pineapples to two plots of land, thus make more profits to support her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, urea and insecticides.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El Joven Miguel esta solicitando un préstamo para la construcción de un cuarto de madera al frente de su casa. Ya que tiene el proyecto de iniciar un negocio de ventas de abarrotes, por que en su colonia no hay una tienda cercas don de puedan ir a comprar los vecinos su mandado. 
Miguel es soltero  y trabaja en una fabrica, en el aria de producción, con el sueldo que recibe pagara el crédito. Ya que vive con su mama y con quien compartan de los gastos familiares.
Miguel desea tener su propio negocio y construir el cuarto que acondicionara.
texts.en:
This young man, Miguel is requesting a loan for the construction of a wooden room in front of his house. He has recently started a business selling groceries, because there is no close store in his area where he can shop for what they need.  

Miguel is single, and works at a factory in the production area.  He will use part of his salary to pay for this credit.  He lives with his mother, who shares the household expenses.  

Miguel hopes to have his own business and to have air conditioning in his room.

loans.use: to build a room out of wood.

loans.name: Janet Yolanda

texts.es:
Janet es una mujer de 25 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, Janet no pudo estudiar la carrera de Enfermería que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Janet puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede atender a un aproximado de 25 clientes y cree que le va bien por su buen atención.
 Janet se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, menestras, fideos, gaseosas, entre otros; de esta manera Janet tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda ampliar su negocio y así ella espera poder lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y un local propio para el desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Janet is a 25-year-old woman, single, and lives in the city of Pisco with her parents and siblings. She is a very happy, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Sadly, because of a lack of economic resources and her need to work to support her parents, Janet was not able to study for the nursing degree she wanted, but she would have liked to have been able to do it very much. In her free time, she likes to play sports, and on some occasions, she cooks a very tasty rice with duck to share with her family. 

With much effort, dedication and help from her mother, Janet began her small business selling groceries and drinks. Every day, she starts work early in the morning. She can serve approximately 25 customers, and she believes that things are going well due to her good service. Janet is very grateful for Kiva lenders, because the help given will allow her to buy merchandise for her business, such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, mixed vegetables, noodles, soft drinks, among other things. In this way, she will have a better-stocked business with which she hopes to be able to raise her sales and increase her income. This will help her a lot to be able to grow her business, and she hopes to be able to achieve her great dream of having her own house and her own premises for developing her business.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, milk, mixed vegetables, noodles, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: El señor Oscar de la edad de 50 años, de familia agricultora tiene 1 manzana de piña sembrada y también trabaja como guarda de seguridad para poder cubrir el solo con los diferentes gastos del hogar, ya que su esposa no trabaja por que hoy en día esta difícil encontrar un empleo, ha tenido dificultades con sus cultivos por el ataque de plagas pero a cómo puede sale adelante venciendo obstáculos y para prevenirse de esto, el crédito solicitado será para comprar insecticidas, abono, urea para darle mantenimiento y esperando que en un futuro pueda llegar a sembrar dos manzanas de piñas con otros cultivos para tener variedad y heredarle a sus nietos un trabajo seguro para subsistir.
texts.en:
Oscar is a fifty-year-old man who comes from a farming family.  He has approximately 1.75 acres of land planted with pineapples, and also works as a security guard. This is because he alone has to cover the various household expense.  His wife does not work as it is so difficult to find a job at the moment. 

He has had problems with his crops due to pests, but he gets by as best he can, overcoming all obstacles.  The loan which he is applying for is to buy insecticide, fertiliser and urea so as to take precautions against such problems.  He hopes that, in the future, he will be able to plant 3.5 acres with pineapples, along with other crops for a bit of variety, and to leave his grandchildren secure jobs from which to make a living.

loans.use: To buy insecticide, fertiliser and urea.

loans.name: José Andrei

texts.es:
Jose Andrei es vecino de Cartago. Tiene mas de seis años de trabajar con ganado de leche. Los lácteos es una de sus pasiones es por eso que él desea un préstamo de  500 000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de una vaca lechera, con la que podrá empezar su proyecto lechero.
El sabe que contar con una vaca más es un mayor sacrificio y demandará más trabajo tanto para él como para su madre, con quien comparte las labores. Sin embargo, el deseo de ser un microempresario exitoso y  sacar adelante a su familia mejorando las condiciones de vida, lo motiva a esforzarse con gran esmero.
texts.en:
Jose Andrei lives in Cartago, Costa Rica. He has more than six years of working with dairy cattle. Dairy is one of his passions and this is why he wants a loan of 500,000 (five hundred thousand colones) to buy a dairy cow, with which he can begin his dairy project.
 
He knows that an additional cow requires a lot of work and sacrifice for both himself and his mother, who helps him with the work. Still, his desire to run his own successful business and continue to improve the quality of life for his family are a great motivation for him.

loans.use: to buy another dairy cow and increase his production of milk.

loans.name: Carlos Hugo

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja y su pequeño hijo de 8 años, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Carlos no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Civil que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Carlos trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con una pequeña mototaxi, la cual utiliza para brindar sus servicios, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por el empeño que le pone a su trabajo.
Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños; de esta manera Carlos junto con el apoyo de su pareja  podrá iniciar su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, así pues él desea seguir trabajando y esforzándose para brindarles una buena educación y calidad de vida para su pequeño.
texts.en:
Carlos is 43 years old and lives in the city of Chincha with his partner and 8-year-old son. He loves his family dearly, and they are his principal motivation in life. He is a kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person who, together with his partner, does his best to provide a good life for his family. Unfortunately, Carlos was not able to study to be a civil engineer as he would have liked. In his free time, he likes to play soccer with his friends and neighbors and sometimes cooks delicious chicken and rice for his family.  

Carlos has a small mototaxi and works hard seven days a week offering transport services. He sets off early every morning to go around the city streets looking for customers, and works around 12 hours a day. He believes that his hard work has been the key to his success. Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, with their help, he will be able to buy merchandise (men's, women's, and children's clothes) in order to start a small clothes-selling business with his partner. Carlos wants to continue working hard to be able to provide a good education and quality of life for his son.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume, compacts, make up, trousers and ladies' and men's shirts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy zinc sheets and purlins.

loans.name: Jazmina Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Jazmina habitante del barrio monseñor Lezcano, siempre se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos aproximadamente desde hace 7 años producto que distribuye por encargo y mantiene en su casa, sus hijos creciendo cada vez mas y preparándose para ser profesionales en un futuro, el cual es el mayor sueño de Jazmina, todo gracias a la ayuda de su mama que siendo soltera los ha sacado adelante. Solicita apoyo de un cuarto crédito para invertir en 2 bolsones de ropa de segunda para seguir trabajando y ofrecerle variedad a su clientela.
texts.en: Jazmina lives in the neighbourhood of Monseñor Lezcano. For about seven years she has sold clothing and cosmetics on a continuous basis, articles that she delivers to order and which she stores at home. Her children are growing all the time and are studying to be professionals in the future. This is Jazmina's greatest dream. Thanks to her mother's help she has been able to give her children a good education, as she herself is a single mother. She is applying for a fourth loan to invest in two bags of second-hand clothing, in order to be able to continue working and to offer her customers variety.

loans.use: To buy two bags of used clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, ceramics, putty and to cover labor costs

loans.name: Khoudia's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 06 femmes toutes du même village. Elles vivent en parfaite harmonie.

L'emprunteur en vedette de ce groupe,Couma Salla, est une femme âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants dont 01 garçon. Elle fait du petit commerce et de l'embouche. Sur La photo, elle est debout avec la main levée.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter 01kg de poivre,un paquet de jumbo, 01 kg piment et 04 moutons pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et épargne au sein du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 6 women all from the same village. They live in perfect harmony. 

The featured borrower in this group is Couma Salla. She is a 36-year-old woman, married, and the mother of two children, including one boy. She has a small-scale businesses and fattens animals to sell. In the photo, she is the one standing with her hand raised.

With her loan, she would like to purchase 1 kg of black pepper, a packet of Jumbo, 1 kg of chili peppers, and 4 head of sheep to fatten.

With the profits, she helps out her husband in covering family expenses and saves money at the 'banc villageois'.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and animals to raise and sell

loans.name: Mame Diarra's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 20 femmes toutes du même village. Elles habitent la même localité et développent de bonnes relations amicales.

La représentante de ce groupe, Mame Diarra, est une femme mariée de 39 ans avec 06 enfants dont 04 garçons. Elle fait du petit commerce de tissus. Elle fait aussi de l’élevage et de l'agriculture. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite en orange
.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter 10 rouleaux de Tissus maylous et 01 de bassin et 05 moutons pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et lui permettent d'épargner à chaque réunion.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 20 women all from the same village. They live in the same town and are developing good friendly relations.

The group's representative, Mame Diarra, is a married woman, 39 years old, who has six children, including four boys. She has a small-scale business selling cloth. She also raises animals and is a farmer. In the photo, she is the one standing at the right wearing orange.

With her loan, she would like to purchase 10 rolls of 'maylous' cloth, 1 basin, and 5 head of sheep to fatten. 

With the profits, she helps out her husband in covering family expenses. The profits enable her to save money at every group meeting.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and animals to raise and sell

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Norma es una clienta de primer crédito con Afodenic, de 39 años de edad es casada y con 3 hijos estudiantes que dependen de ella y su esposo quien la apoya con los gastos del hogar con su salario, doña norma tiene una pulpería hace 1 año lo que forma parte de la economía familiar como sostén del hogar, solicita un crédito de 16000 córdobas para la compra de productos lácteos, granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas refrescantes entre otros para invertir en su venta de esta manera poder ofrecer un mejor ingreso económico a la familia y lograr que sus hijos culminen una carera profesional.
texts.en: Norma is a first-time loan client with Afodenic. She is 39 and is married with three children, all of whom study and are dependent on her and her husband. Norma's husband helps her with the household expenses with his salary. A year ago Norma started a small general store, which helps with the family's finances to support the household. She is requesting a loan of 16,000 córdobas to buy dairy products, grains, sweets, soft drinks and other items. By investing in her business in this way she will be able to provide a higher income for her family, as well as enabling her children to finish their professional training.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, grains, sweets, soft drinks and other items

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Due to cultural reasons, Reem prefers that her photo is not on the Internet. Thus, the above photo is of her husband.

Reem is a 32-year-old married female from Sahab, Jordan. She has six children.

She has requested a loan of 1000 Jordanian dinar to pay for her home improvement expenses and for building additional rooms.

In the future, Reem is planning to build another floor and a store room opposite the house.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvement expenses

loans.name: Bok Askane Ourack 1 Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 38 femmes toutes du même village. Elles vivent toutes en bonne entente et harmonie.

L'emprunteur en vedette de ce groupe, Wedji, est une femme mariée. Elle est âgée de 50 ans. Elle est mère de 06 enfants dont 03 garçons. Elle fait du petit commerce. Elle vend des produits détergents, des boucles d'oreilles etc....Elle mène cette activité depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle se ravitaille à Dakar, Touba ou Louga. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite avec la main levée.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter 02 seaux de détergents et 02 moutons pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide ses enfants pour leur scolarité.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 38 women all from the same village. They all get along well together living in harmony.

The featured borrower of this group is Wedji. She is a married woman, 50 years old, and the mother of six children, including three boys.
