She has a small-scale business selling detergents, earrings, etc. and has been in this business for over ten years. She resupplies herself from Dakar, Touba, or Louga. In the photo, she is standing at the right with her hand raised.

With her loan, she would like to purchase 2 buckets of detergents and 2 head of sheep to fatten. 

With her profits, she helps her children by covering their schooling costs.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for commerce and some animals to fatten

loans.name: Bata Yacine's Group

texts.fr: le groupe  a été créé le 30 décembre 2009.IL est composé de 06 femmes issues du même village. Elles se son&ét organisées par affinité, par voisinage. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce et l'embouche ovine. Magatte Mamadou(debout à droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 38 ans. Elle a en charge 04 enfants. Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce d'habits. En parallèle elle fait de l'embouche Ovine. Elle mène cette d'activité depuis longtemps. Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter la marchandise 10 pièces de tissus 10 paquets de garniture pour les pagnes et des moutons pour la poursuite de ses activités et la satisfaction de sa clientèle. Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne à chaque réunion.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 30, 2009. It comprises six women from the same village. They are organized by affinity and neighborhood. Their main work involves small-scale commerce and the fattening of sheep. 

Magatte Mamadou (standing at the right in the photo) is the group's official. She is 38 years old and has four children to support. She has a business selling clothing. Parallel to this, she fattens sheep. She has been doing this work for a long time. 

Her loan will enable her to purchase merchandise: 10 lengths of cloth, 10 packets of accessories for 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), and some sheep for business purposes and for satisfying her customers. Her goal is to support her family and to bolster her savings at every group meeting.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, thread, and sheep

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
Eduarda es una mujer de 62 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ella tiene tres hijos, que ya son mayores de edad, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente Eduarda sufrió la pérdida de su amado esposo, desde entonces ella es el pilar más grande de su familia; Eduarda no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de Enfermería, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer sombreros de pasa y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Carnero para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años Eduarda puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de bebidas y los fines de semana vende comida, como el delicioso caldo de gallina y la riquísima chanfainita, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su rica sazón y por la experiencia que tiene en su negocio.
Eduarda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como gaseosas, refrescos, cervezas, entre otras, así también podrá comprar insumos para la preparación de sus riquísimos potajes; de esta manera Eduarda espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio y en un futuro no muy lejano desea poder terminar la construcción de la parte trasera de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Eduarda is a 62-year-old woman who lives in the city of Chincha. She has three grown-up children whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. Sadly Eduarda lost her dear husband, and since then has been the main pillar of her family. Eduarda was not able to undertake further education as she had to work to help her parents from a young age, but she would have liked to study nursing. In her free time she likes to make straw hats and she sometimes cooks a delicious lamb stew to share with her family.

On her own initiative, with much determination and dedication, Eduarda started a small business selling drinks several years ago. At the weekend she also sells food, such as her delicious chicken soup and chanfainita [a kind of beef stew]. She starts work early every morning and works for around 10 hours. She thinks she is doing well thanks to her delicious seasoning and the experience she has of running her business.

Eduarda is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because the help she receives will enable her to buy merchandise such as sodas, soft drinks and beer, among other items, as well as ingredients to prepare her delicious soups and stews. In this way Eduarda hopes to increase her sales and her income, which will help her to grow her business. In the not too distant future she would like to finish the building work at the back of her home.

loans.use: to buy drinks and ingredients

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es: Doña Rosa Lina es habitante del municipio de san Ignacio, su esposo labora como chofer y con esos ingresos le apoya en los gastos del hogar deseando que un futuro sus condiciones de vida sean mejores, ella desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, en su trayecto la dificultad más grande que ha tenido es la falta de capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, pero ahora con la oportunidad que le brinda AFODENIC a través de KIVA le es más fácil seguir adelante  con este primer financiamiento solicitado para surtir en su venta con papayas, melones, bananos, naranjas, papas, pipianes, piñas, zanahorias, yucas, bananos entre otros para comercializarlas en diversos departamentos del país y así obtener mejor economía para sus hijos y familia.
texts.en: Rosa Lina lives in the municipality of San Ignacio. Her husband works as a driver, and with this income he helps her with the household expenses, hoping that, at some time in the future, their standard of living will improve. She has been involved in the sale of fruit and vegetables for many years. During this time her biggest difficulty has been the lack of working capital in order to continue investing in her business. However, now with the opportunity that AFODENIC offers via Kiva, it is easier to go ahead with this first loan, which she has requested to supply her small shop with papayas, melons, bananas, oranges, potatoes, chilies, pineapples, carrots, yuccas, and bananas, among other things. She will then sell these items in several provinces of the country and, in this way, achieve a better standard of living for her children and family.

loans.use: To buy papayas, melons, bananas, oranges, potatoes, chilies, pineapples, carrots, yuccas, and bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise, a display cabinet and a counter.

loans.name: Rolando Alcides

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre de 45 años, se encuentra felizmente casado, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus cuatro pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amble, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; Rolando no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de Mecánica Automotriz, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos, y en algunas ocasiones su esposa lo engríe cocinando un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de un amigo, Rolando puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de servicio de duplicado de llaves, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él pude trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su calidad y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Rolando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que podrá realizar el pintado y tarrajeo de su vivienda; de esta manera Rolando espera contar con un ambiente más adecuado y seguro donde su familia pueda vivir sin correr riesgos, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su sueño de tener su propia ferretería y ver convertido a sus hijos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Rolando is a 45-year-old, happily married man. He lives in the town of Pucallpa with his wife and four small children, whom he loves dearly and who are his main reason for living. He is a friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, together with his wife, dedicates all of his efforts to ensure that his family get ahead. Rolando was not able to study to become a professional because, from a very young age, he had to work, in order to help his parents with the household expenses. However, he would very much have liked to have been able to study to be a car mechanic. In his free time he likes to play football with his friends and neighbours, and sometimes his wife spoils him and cooks him delicious chicken with rice.

With a lot of determination and dedication, and thanks to the help of a friend, Rolando set up his small business cutting keys. He starts work early in the morning every day. He has about 10 hours of work, and thinks that his business is going well because of the quality of his work and the friendly way he deals with his customers.

Rolando is very grateful for the Kiva loans, as thanks to the help that they provide, he will be able to make some improvements to his home by painting and decorating it. In this way, Rolando hopes to provide a more adequate and safe environment, where his family can live safely. In this way, he will continue working and striving to achieve his dream of owning his own hardware store and of seeing his children grow up to be good professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home

loans.name: Fidencio Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. fidencio tiene la edad de 50 años y en esta ocasión esta solicitando el préstamo de Credituyo para equipar de mercancía su dulcería ya que se ah quedado con muy poca y desea un poco mas de ventas, el Sr. fidencio es casado con 2 hijos comenta que las ventas han estado un poco bajas por la misma razón de la poca mercancía la dulcería del Sr. fidencio tiene una antigüedad de 3 años.
texts.en:
Fidencio, 50, is requesting this loan from Credituyo to stock his candy store with merchandise because he doesn't have very much and he wants more sales.

Fidencio is married and has two children.  He comments that sales have been a bit slow because of his lack of merchandise.  Fidencio has had his candy shop for three years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his candy store

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es: La sra. Viviana de 32 años es casada se ha dedicado al venta de ropa desde hace 4 años su esposo el sr homero trabaja en una notaria desde hace 9 años ambos desean ampliar su casa pensando en sus 2 hijas menores de edad alas cuales quieren dejarles un buen patrimonio por lo cual solicitan apoyo para construir cuarto en planta baja. Cada una de sus hijas tendra su propio cuarto y la privacidad que necesitan.
texts.en:
Viviana, 32, is married and has been in the business of selling clothing for 4 years. Her husband is Homero. He has been working in a notary for 9 years. 

Both want to expand their house thinking of their two young daughters whom they want to leave a good estate. That is why they are requesting this loan; to build a room on the ground floor. Each of their daughters would have their own room and the privacy they need.

loans.use: to build a room on the ground level.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto es un hombre de 67 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, tiene tres hijos que ya son mayores de edad y a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, lamentablemente por diversas razones desde hace varios años se separó de su esposa; Roberto no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de soldadura de vehículos, en sus ratos libres le gusta asistir a la iglesia para agradecer a Dios por todas las bendiciones que le ha dado y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Roberto puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de pescado seco, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas, donde puede atender a un promedio de 15 clientes y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y buena atención que brinda a sus clientes.
Roberto se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mas pescado para su abastecer su negocio; de esta manera Roberto espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda ampliar su negocio y así surgir cada día al lado de su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto is a 67-year-old man living in the city of Pucallpa. He has 3 children who are already grown and whom he loves – they are his principal reason for living. He is a very friendly, hard-working, and enthusiastic person who has dedicated all his efforts to advancing his family. Lamentably, for diverse reasons, for several years now, he has been separated from his wife. Roberto was unable to pursue professional studies but he would have liked very much to have studied vehicle welding. In his free time he likes to attend church to thank God for all the blessings he has been given and, on some occasions, he cooks a rich Rice with Chicken to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Roberto launched his small business selling dried fish. He initiates work every day from the early hours of the morning. Roberto works approximately 8 hours, during which time he attends to an average of 15 customers, and he believes that the business is going well, due to his good prices and the service he offers his customers.

Roberto is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, due to their help, he has been able to purchase more fish to supply his business. In this manner, Roberto hopes to augment his sales and increase his income, which will serve greatly to, little by little, expand business and help him and his family advance daily.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, blocks, sand, iron, wire ties and planks and to pay for the labor to build a front wall for her house.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 32 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete en el distrito de Imperial con su madre y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, lamentablemente José no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, él es una persona que ha trabajado desde muy joven, en especial por varios años se dedico al rubro de la construcción, en donde le fue bien y pudo ahorrar el dinero necesario para comprar su propia mototaxi.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su distrito en búsqueda de pasajeros, él brinda servicios de transporte en su mototaxi, José pude trabajar un aproximado de 1 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque es conocido en la zona y brinda un buen servicio a sus clientes.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento de su mototaxi, ya que desea poder hacer refacciones al motor, tapizado y comprar llantas nuevas para su vehículo; de esta manera José tendrá su mototaxi en mejores condiciones, con ello espera poder seguir trabajando y atendiendo a mayor cantidad de clientes para poder aumentar sus ingresos, así él seguirá esforzándose y trabajando para lograr su sueño de tener su propia empresa constructora y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
José is a 32-year-old, single man who lives with his mother and siblings in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial. He is a kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with dreams of excelling. Unfortunately, José was not able to study a professional career because he had to begin working at a very young age. He started working in construction and, when times were good, he put away money he later used to buy his own motor rickshaw. 

With much determination and dedication, José leaves early each morning to travel the streets of Imperial in search of passengers. José believes he has been successful so far because he is well-known in the area and always makes sure to deliver good service to his passengers.

José is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with the help of this loan, he will be able to pay for the regular maintenance of his vehicle. He will make repairs on his motor, redo the upholstery, and put new tires on his motor rickshaw. With a better vehicle, José hopes to get more passengers and increase his profits. In this way, he will continue working and making an effort to realize his dream of one day owning his own construction company and his own house.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his motor rickshaw.

loans.name: Umoja Kigogo Group

texts.en:
Linda, who is in her early 30s, is married and living with her husband with a girl of one year old. She has been selling clothes (fabrics), cultural sandoes (a kind of shoes made by using animal skin), and other cultural wearings for four years now. She works from 7 AM to 6 PM daily and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to increase her business stock to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to expand her business.

Linda will share this loan with her loan group "Umoja Kigogo," which totals 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her business stock to resell.

loans.name: Malila Group

texts.en:
Renatus, who in his early 40s, is married with three children who are still going to school. He has been running a fruit and vegetable business for two years now. He works from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be his 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to buy more fruits and vegetables, kerosine, wheat flour, sugar, backing flour, and beans, and has paid back his loan successfully. He wants a loan to increase his business stock. His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

Renatus will share this loan with his loan group "Malila," which has a total of 21 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase his business stock.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: El señor Luis, es una persona de 44 años de edad de estado civil soltero pero vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su propio domicilio, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos; la actividad económica a la que se dedica es la producción agrícola; producen papa, haba, arveja y zanahoria en sus propias parcelas los mismos que cuentan con riego por inundación y aspersión que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de K'ayarani del municipio de Tíraque distante desde la ciudad de Cochabamba sobre la carretera antigua a Santa Cruz en el Km. 89. Y finalmente el cliente y su familia manifiestan tener el deseo de mejorar e incrementar su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital  de inversión para realizar la compra de insumos agrícolas que a mediano plazo le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos que van a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Luis is 44 years old and single, but in a common-law relationship.  Luis finished elementary school and lives in his own home.  He has three children who are financially dependent on him.  

Luis engages in farming activities such as growing potatoes, beans, peas, and carrots on land that he owns.  He waters his crops by utilizing the irrigation and sprinkler systems that are shared within the community of K’ayarari in the town of Tíraque.  This area is located quite some distance from the city of Cochabamba, specifically at Km. 89 along the old highway to Santa Cruz.  

Luis and his family say that they want to improve and increase their farming production.  In order for this to happen, they need to request investment capital for buying farming supplies.  By obtaining a loan in this manner, he will be able to generate more income so that he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Upendo Kigogo Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her early 60s, is a widow living with some of her relatives in her house. Fatuma had nine children, six of which died, and the remaining are adults and depend upon themselves. She has had two businesses: Genge business selling fruits and vegetables and bodaboda (motorcycle services), for three years now. She works from 9AM to 7PM daily and she is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to buy more fruits and vegetables to increase sales. Her dream is to one day be able to repair her house to look nice.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Upendo Kigogo," which totals 15 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetable to increase sales.

loans.name: Twitange Group

texts.en:
Abdurazaki, who is in his late 30s, is married with two children who are still going to school.  He has been selling fruits and vegetables for one year now.  He works from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to buy more fruits and vegetables to resell and has been able to pay back his loan successfully.  His dream is to one day be able to expand his business and to improve his business premises.
 
Abdurazaki will share this loan with his loan group, Twitange, which has a total of 10 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Sunguchini Group

texts.en:
Richardi, who is in his late 20s, is married with one child, who goes to school.  

He has been selling food for three years now. He works from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which he wants to use for buying a fridge and to restock the inventory in his food store. His dream is to one day be able to open a grocery store.

Richardi will share this loan with his loan group "Sunguchini," which has a total of 10 members who hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a fridge and to restock the inventory in his food store.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: El joven Oscar de 27 años de edad habitante del municipio de ticuantepe junto a su mama, es soltero su sueño más grande es poder construir una casita en un futuro para ser independiente, trabaja para una empresa privada y con sus ingresos le apoya a su madre con los gastos del hogar, el crédito solicitado es para realizar un cuarto para tener un poco mas de privacidad, dicha inversión no la puede cubrir de una sola vez porque su salario es muy bajo por lo que con el financiamiento comprara todos los materiales necesario para empezar la obra como son: cemento, arena, hierro, bloques, y pagara la mano de obra, agradece el apoyo y la confianza que le brinda Kiva a través de Afodenic para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oscar is a young 27-year-old man, and lives in the district of Ticuantepe with his mother. He is single. His biggest dream is to be able to build a little house, at some time in the future, in order to be independent. He works for a private company, and with his income he helps his mother with the household expenses. 

The loan that Oscar has applied for is to build a room in order to have a little more privacy. He cannot finance this investment all in one go, because his wages are very low. Consequently, with this loan, he intends to buy all the materials necessary to start the job: - cement, sand, steel and blocks, and he will also pay for the labour. He is grateful for the support and trust that Kiva, via Afodenic, place in him, enabling him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, steel and blocks, and to pay labour expenses

loans.name: El Laural Group

texts.es: Formado por cuatro  socios emprendedores con cinco años de estar trabajando con la institución una de ellas es Jilma del Carmen que se dedica a vender comida y fritanga por las noches en su casa, actualmente brinda servicios de alquiler de unos pequeños módulos para negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, aceite, frijoles, carne de res, carne de pollo etc. Yalila Damaris vende ropa usada y calzados en su domicilio y junto a su esposo tienen una moto caponera que brinda servicio de transporte a la comunidad y parte de préstamo a invertido en el mantenimiento de la moto taxi que le genera otros ingresos, Marlene del Socorro vende nacatamales los fines de semana y Mauricio tiene un cyber café desde hace varios años el crédito lo solicita para la compra de dos computadoras y cambio de accesorios que están en mal estado y brindar un mejor servicio a la clientela.
texts.en:
This group consists of four entrepreneurs who have worked with ADIM for the past five years.  One of them is Jilma del Carmen, who sells meals and fried foods from her house at night.  At the moment, she also rents out a few small rooms as a side business.  Her loan will be invested in the purchase of basic grains such as rice, as well as oil, beans, beef, chicken, and other items.  

Yalila Damaris sells used clothing and shoes from her home.  She and her husband have a small van that they use to provide transportation services in their community.  Part of her loan will be invested in the maintenance of her taxi so that she can generate additional income.

Marline del Socorro sells Nicaraguan tamales on the weekends.

Mauricio has owned a cybercafé for several years.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy two computers and to replace accessories that are in bad condition.  This improve the service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, beans, beef, chicken, and other items.

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es: Rubén vive en la Zona de Sacaba una provincia de la Ciudad de Cochabamba, el Señor Rubén tiene tres hijas está casada con la Señora Paola. Rubén es tiene la profesión de mecánico  y de la misma manera tiene un taxi con el cual realiza también trabajos por la noche, él tuvo una niñez muy difícil ya que su padre murió cuando él era un niño y desde entonces tuvo que ayudar a la madre en la crianza de los hermanos pequeños y el empezó a trabajar como ayudante de un mecánico y después estudiaba por la noche y de esa manera pudo terminar el colegio y hacer una pequeña carrera de mecánico  y su esposa trabaja como cuidadora de unas personas mayores. Él solicita el crédito para poder hacer cambio de motor a su vehículo ya que también este es otro ingreso extra que tiene el para poder así de esa manera cumplir con la educación y alimentación de su familia, al mismo tiempo el Señor Rubén quiere terminar de estudiar la carrera de Odontología, Rubén y la Señora Paola trabajan en doble turno para poder tener mayores ingresos y que sus hijas terminen el colegio, como también realicen una carrera. Rubén es una persona responsable y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Rubén lives in Sacaba, one of the provincial districts in the city of Cochabamba.  He is married to Sra. Paola and they have three daughters.  Rubén is a mechanic by profession, but he also owns a taxi so that he can work at night.  He had a very difficult childhood since his father died when he was a boy.  At that point, he had to help his mother raise his younger siblings.  Rubén began working as a mechanic’s assistant and then studied at night so that he could finish high school and complete a short program in auto repairs.  His wife works as a caregiver for elderly people.  

Rubén is requesting a loan so that he can replace the engine of his vehicle since this is the means by which he is able to earn the extra income he needs to complete his education and feed his family.  He wants to finish a degree in Dentistry.  Rubén and Sra. Paola are working double shifts so that they can have more income to help their daughters finish school and pursue degrees of their own.  Rubén is a responsible and hardworking individual.

loans.use: to replace the engine of his taxi.

loans.name: Hermes

texts.es: El Señor Hermes tiene 29 años de edad vive en Chimoré del departamento de Cochabamba es agricultor y se empeña mucho en su actividad ya que aprendió de su padre y hermano todo lo que empíricamente sabe hasta ahora. Hermes es una persona sencilla y siempre estuvo acostumbrado a la labor del campo, cuando era muy joven tuvo que afrontar la vida muy duramente ya que sufrió varias estafas cuando tenia algo para invertir los socios que consiguió siempre aprovechaban de el sin dejarle alguna utilidad o por lo menso que recuperara su inversión, ahora el esta mas estable ya que pidió ayuda a su familia y le hicieron recuperar sus perdidas, se entero de lo créditos Kiva y solicita para poder pagar la mano de obra y algunos insumos que se necesitan en su chaco es soltero pero sueña con tener una familia y brindarles todo lo mejor que pueda.
texts.en:
Sr. Hermes is 29 years old and lives in Chimoré, which is in the Department of Cochabamba.  He is a hardworking farmer who learned everything he knows about his trade to date from his father and brother.  

Hermes is a simple person who has always been used to working in the field.  At a very young age, he had to confront some very difficult situations in his life.  On several occasions, he participated in investment opportunities and was taken advantage by the other partners since they did leave not leave him any profits or allow him to recover his original investment.  

His situation today is much more stable since he has requested assistance from his family to help him recoup his losses.  Hermes learned about the Kiva loans, so he is requesting one so that he can pay for labor and a few supplies that he needs for cultivating his land.  He is single, but dreams about having a family and providing them the best that he can offer.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to purchase a few farming supplies.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: El Sr. Humberto trabaja como soldador tiene un pequeño taller de soldadura con la antigüedad de 1 año es casado y tiene 2 hijos tiene la edad de 42 años en esta ocasión esta deseando el crédito para la mejora de su vivienda mejorar su recamara ya que esta un poca gastada desea contar con el apoyo de kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Humberto works as a welder at a small soldering workshop.  He has one year of experience.  Humberto is 42 years old, married, and has two children.  

On this occasion he is seeking a home improvement loan so that he can renovate his bedroom since it is a little worn.  Therefore, he is seeking assistance from Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for renovations to his bedroom.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 54 años de edad, es comerciante de ropa en su casa de habitación y también sale a vender sus productos a la calle, tiene 4 hijos todos mayores y profesionales, la única  dificultad que ha tenido fue cuando falleció su esposo pero gracias a la ayuda de Dios logro salir adelante con sus hijos superando esa pérdida tan grande, ahora en sus planes está el mejorar las condiciones de su casa para tener una vivienda digna y mejor por eso ella solicita apoyo de un primer crédito para realizar mejoras en un cuarto de su vivienda y los  materiales que necesita comprar para dicho objetivo son: bloques, cemento, arena, láminas de zinc, hojas de plywood y el pago de la mano de obra, con esto podrá realizar la obra gracias al financiamiento ya que ella no puede cubrir este gasto de un solo pago.
texts.en: Doña Rosa is 54 years old. She sells clothing in her home and she also goes out to sell her products on the street. She has four children, all of whom are adults and have careers. The only difficulty that she has had was when her husband died, but thanks to the help of God, she managed to advance, along with her children, overcoming this great loss. Now it is in her plans to improve the condition of her house to have a worthy and better residence. For this she is applying for her first loan to make improvements in a room of her house. The materials that she needs to buy for this purpose are blocks, cement, sand, sheets of zinc, and plywood, and she needs to pay for labor. With this she will be able to do the work, thanks to the financing, since she is not able to cover this expense in a single payment.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, sand, sheets of zinc, and plywood and pay for labor

loans.name: Bertha Adilia

texts.es: Doña Bertha de 40 años, su compañero de vida albañil trabaja por su cuenta propia, tienen tres hijos el mayor de 18 años ya trabaja, estudia y le ayuda a ellos, su negocio es venta de ropa, calzado, cosméticos, electrodomésticos, este quinto crédito lo necesita para surtir con todo lo mencionado, con las inversiones que ha hecho le ha ayudado un poco a mejorar su vida, con ahorros ganancias y mejor comodidad para su hogar, ella espera seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, aumentar sus clientes, también trabaja en una distribuidora de alli allí obtiene otros ingresos para lograr un equilibrio en los gastos, ella desea que sus hijos aprovechen sus estudios y se superen.
texts.en:
Doña Bertha is 40 years old. Her partner is a self employed construction worker, and they have three children. The oldest, who is 18 and already working, studies, and helps them.Their business is selling clothes, footwear, cosmetics and domestic appliances. 

She needs this fifth loan to stock up on these goods. The investments she has already made have helped to improve her life, by saving their earnings and making their home more comfortable. She hopes to continue investing in the business and gain more customers. 

She also works at a wholesaler there. There she earns more money so that she can break even with the expenses. She wants her children to make the most of their studies and better themselves.

loans.use: to buy clothes, footwear, cosmetics and domestic appliances.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La Señora Margarita Es casada esta pensionada, su esposo tiene un negocio propio que es un taller eléctrico  La Señora Margarita tiene un pequeño negocio de ropa usada ya tiene varios años con su negocio y hasta ahorita a funcionado muy bien en esta ocasion esta pidiendo un prestamo para comprar mas ropa de temporada y  tener mucho mejor su negocio y asi aumentar un poco mas sus ganancias desea contar con el apoyo de kiva.
texts.en:
Margarita is married, her husband is an electrician and owns his own business.  Margarita has a small used clothing business, and she has been running it successfully for many years..  

She is asking for a loan to buy more clothes that are currently in style and therefore increase her sales and profit.  She hopes for lender support from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock his grocery business.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es:
Adriana es una mujer de 65 años, se encuentra felizmente casada, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposo y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo han dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Adriana no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocina, en especial uno riquísimo Chicharrones de Pollo para engreír a su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace muchos años Adriana se dedica a la agricultura, ella trabaja en su pequeña parcela donde cultiva uva, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores de campo, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por las enseñanzas que le dejaron sus padres.
Adriana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias  a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento de su cosecha, tanto de riego, abono, limpieza y otros; de esta manera Adriana tendrá su cultivo en buenas condiciones, asegurando así su buen desarrollo, con ella espera poder lograr una buena cosecha para así poder venderla a un buen precio, así Adriana espera seguir trabajando y tener una larga vida al lado de su querida familia.
texts.en:
Adriana, 65, is happily married.  She lives in the city of Ica with her husband and their two children, the heart and soul of her life.  Adriana is a happy and enthusiastic person.  She and her husband have worked hard all their lives to make a better life for their family.  She would have liked to have studied for a career but, unfortunately, she had to leave school early.  In her spare time, she likes to cook, and she tells us that chicharrones de pollo is a special favorite for her family.
Adriana has a farming business that she has worked hard to build over many years.  She grows grapes, working on her small farm every day, from early in the morning.  She likes the work and says that she's successful because she learned farming from her parents and has worked at it all of her life.  
Adrian is grateful to Kiva lenders because their help will provide the funds she needs to maintain her crop: irrigating it, fertilizing it, weeding it, etc.  The investment will allow her to harvest a good crop and continue developing her business.  For the future, Adriana hopes to continue working and live for many years more at the side of her beloved family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es: El sr Jose Carlós es originario del Estado de Tabasco radica en esta en la ciudad desde hace mas de 10 años, El se dedica al comercio en general y desea dedicarse definitivamente a la venta de abarrotes el sr Jose Carlos había estado manejando una tienda de productos naturales durante varios años y ahora solicita este préstamo para cambiar de giro y surtir una tienda de abarrotes que inicio hace 2 meses.
texts.en: Mr. jose Carlós is originally from the state of Tabasco and has been in his city for more than 10 years in general commerce and wants to fully commit himself to the sales of groceries.  Mr. Jose Carlos has been running a natural foods store for several years and is now asking for a loan to change directions and fill a shop with groceries, a project that he began about two months ago.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El señor Miguel es casado, su esposa es profesora trabaja en un colegio de la ciudad, tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad, Miguel se dedica a la actividad de taxista por mas de 2 años,viene realizando esta labor, trabajando en el cercado de Ica y también para los hoteles brindándole servicio a los turistas,los desafíos que enfrenta es estas en taxi todo el día y aveces hasta de madrugada para ganar un poco mas de dinero para el bienestar de su familia, el crédito que Miguel esta muy agradecido a los prestamistas Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo y gracias a ello el podrá mejorar su negocio de bodega, ya que realizara tarrajeo de paredes y comprar mercadería para su negocio, lo que le permitira mejorar sus ingresos y luchar para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Terminar de construir su casa, y adquirir otra movilidad para así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia".
texts.en:
Miguel is a married man whose wife is a teacher in a school in the city.  He has a three-year-old son.  Miguel has been a taxi driver for over 2 years, working in and around Ica and also offering his services to tourists in the city's hotels.

The challenge he faces is that he is in the taxi all day, and sometimes until the early hours of the morning, in order to earn a little more money to cater for his family's well-being.  Miguel is very grateful to Kiva lenders for his loan, as  this is the second time that he has received their support.  The loan will enable him to improve his grocery business by cementing over the walls and buying stock, which will allow him to improve his income and strive to realise his greatest dream: "To finish building his house and buy another vehicle so as to improve his family's quality of life".

loans.use: To buy stock and cement

loans.name: Dario

texts.es: El señor Darío de 47 años es soltero y cuenta con un negocio de renta y reparación de computadoras por más de 12 años. Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de computadoras y parte de computadoras ya que sus maquinas necesitan mantenimiento y así pueda dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes ya que la mayoría son estudiantes que van a consulta de tareas escolares deea contar con el apoyo de kiva.
texts.en: Dario is 47 years old, and has operated a business renting and repairing computers for 12 years.  He is requesting a loan to buy computers and computer parts since his machines need maintenance.  He will then be able to provide better service to his clients, the majority of whom are students who go to get help with homework.  He hopes to achieve this with the help of Kiva.

loans.use: Invertir en compra de equipo y partes para computadoras

loans.name: Eufemio Nicolas

texts.es: Don Eufemio de 50 años su esposa es ama de casa tienen 3 hijos, el es una persona trabajadora a sus hijos les está dando estudios  para que se preparen para enfrentar la vida, don Eufemio tiene un negocio de Cyber café que lo administra su hijo mayor de 23 años, también vende gas licuado, siempre se desempeña como albañil y es pastor de una iglesia evangélica es una persona muy activa, sus créditos los ha utilizado en mejora de su casa, este nuevo préstamo número 13 lo necesita para continuar la construcción del muro trasero de su casa, para eso requiere comprar piedra cantera, bloques, estribos, cemento, alambre de amarre, hierro y el pago de mano de obra para poder continuar con su pequeño proyecto de desarrollo con la familia.
texts.en:
Eufemio is 50 years old and his wife is a housewife. They have three children. He’s a hard worker who is providing his children with education so that they can face life. Eufemio has a cyber café business managed by his eldest son of 23 years. He also sells propane, works as a builder and is the pastor of an Evangelical church. 
He has used the loans to make house improvements. This is his 13th loan and will be used to continue building the back wall of his house. He needs to buy quarry stones, cement blocks, struts, cement, support straps, iron and payment for manual labor to continue the small development project with his family.

loans.use: to buy quarry stones, cement blocks, struts, cement, support straps, iron and payment for manual labor to build the back wall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy PVC pipes, a toilet, sand, blocks and cement, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Sang

texts.en:
Sang, 56, is married with 10 children. Seven of them are single and three are married.  Sang runs a pig farm in the backyard of her house and also has a rice farming business. She has been in this type of business for over five years. She breeds and raises hogs to sell to local traders or butchers in her community upon their optimum growth while her husband is involved in trading firewood to support their living. Through their determination and sacrifices, they hope for a higher income and to enable their children to finish their studies at high school level minimum.

For great changes in their current businesses, Sang would like to acquire a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase a plowing machine for farming. This tool can also be used for transportation purposes whenever they attach it with a trailer. Sang’s husband will be able to load his firewood and distribute it to marketplaces quickly. She hopes that the loan will be granted to her to develop their businesses as well as their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a plowing machine for farming.

loans.name: Carla Lucero

texts.es:
Carla es una joven de 19 años de edad, vive al lado de sus padres en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asi como también por así como también su agricultura y sobre todo la generosidad de sus pobladores. Carla es una joven muy trabajadora, ella se dedica a su pequeño negocio de venta de golosinas desde hace 2 años, ya que sus padres son de condición humilde y debido a algunos problemas el dinero no les alcanzaba para poder solventar los gastos del hogar, por ello con mucho ahorro y esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio; ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y ella cree que le va bien porque es muy amable con los clientes y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Carla esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mostradores y una refrigeradora, con lo cual podrá exhibir sus productos de mejor manera y también conservar sus productos en buenas condiciones, así ella mejorar sus ingresos y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria y poder apoyar a su familia”.
texts.en:
Carla is a young, nineteen-year-old woman who lives alongside her parents in the city of Imperial.  The city is characterized as having a warm and welcoming climate, as well as being known for its farming and, above all, for the generosity of its people.  Carla is hard-working and makes a living in her small business where she has been selling snack items for the past two years.  

Her parents live in humble conditions and due to some money problems, they were not making enough to be able to cover the home expenses. With savings and a lot of effort, she succeeded in starting her business.  She works about ten hours a day and believes that her business is going well because she is very kind to her customers and has a lot of desire to continue moving forward.

Carla is very thankful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to the great support that they have offered her, she will be able to buy display counters and a refrigerator.  With these items she will be able to display her products in a better way and also keep her products in good condition, thereby increasing her income.  She will continue fighting to be able to make her biggest dream come true: "to study a career at the university and to be able to support her family."

loans.use: to buy display counters and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Kim

texts.en:
Kim is 49 years and a responsible mother of two school-aged children. She and her spouse raise their children in small community of Kampong Chhnang province. Kim has a business position and manages a stall in a local market where she sells a variety of fish. She has been in this occupation for almost 10 years, earning approximately 13,000 KHR per day. Kim’s husband finances the family with income generated from trading poultry and animals.

To help Kim’s husband with transportation support in his trading activities, Kim is asking for a loan in the sum of 4,000,000 KHR to purchase a motorcycle. This purchase will enable her husband in transporting his products to the marketplaces. She hopes that someday her family-owned businesses will grow and become a viable source of income as they continuously strive to improve.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for the support of her livestock trading business.

loans.name: Chum

texts.en:
Chum is 31 years old and was born in Kompong Speu province. She has a common law relationship with her spouse and has been blessed with one child. She also has a younger sister who lives with her under the same roof. She manages her own farmland on which she usually grows rice in each rainy season to make a livelihood while her husband distributes and trades firewood from his trailer. This direct selling business depends on proper transportation and trailer loads of firewood. 

Chum needs a loan to be able to purchase a bigger trailer for transporting a large amount of firewood to the marketplaces. The previous trailer is old and barely suitable to use--that’s why Chum needs to buy a trailer to sustain the business. She hopes the purchase will enable them to make a better income as well as to grow their firewood business.

loans.use: to purchase a bigger trailer for transporting a large amount of firewood to the marketplaces.

loans.name: Badria

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons Badria prefers that her photo is not on the Internet; thus the above photo is of her son. Badria is a 55-year-old married woman who has 2 family members from Al Hashmi Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for her home improvements. She wants to do maintenance on the home, and she would like to add a balcony. She hopes in the future to create a comfortable space for her family.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Chea is originally from Kompong Speu province. He lives there with his spouse and some of his children. Presently, six of his children are already married while the remaining child is single and helps them with the farming business.  Chea and his wife help each other manage their own farmland for their livelihood. Together, they are able to generate income in the neighborhood of USD 4.00 per day and they have been in the business for more over 30 years. Despite their hardships, Chea would like to help their descendants to get a higher education. 

The purpose of the loan he requested from HKL and Kiva is to pay for tuition fees for his grandchild who is attending a university. He believes that he will be able to help him finish his education so that he can have a bright future someday.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees for his grandchild who is attending a university.

loans.name: Yin

texts.en:
Yin is a 41-year-old farmer living with his family in Kompong Speu province. Rice farming is the primary business and source of income for his family. He grows rice on a few hectares of farmland and he is able to make a decent income to supply the household. However, the income is barely enough to cover his daily costs, so he also works as a paid laborer for additional income. Most of the villagers appreciate his hard work. Yin’s wife opened a tailoring shop in their community to help him in generating a livelihood and uplifting a better standard of living.

Recently, Yin has hired a few laborers to perform the construction in renovating his present house but he has insufficient capital. Therefore, he is applying for a loan in the amount of 1,000 USD to purchase supplies needed for the construction. Yin has nevertaken a loan with HKL before and it will be his first loan. He promises to pay it back in full.

loans.use: to purchase supplies needed for the construction of his home.

loans.name: Kang

texts.en:
Kang, aged 30, is the head of his family that is comprised of four members. He is married to a garment worker and is blessed with two children. He untiringly works at the rice field to provide daily sustenance to his family. Kang has been in this occupation for more than seven years, earning an average income of 7,000 KHR per day. 

At this time, Kang would like to renovate his house partially in order to keep his family in good conditions. Due the lack of capital, he is now asking for a loan in the sum of 1,500 USD to pay for construction costs and to purchase construction materials such as window frames, planks of wood and nails. In the future, Kang hopes to make improvements in farming business and help his children in their education. He promises to pay back his loan in full.

loans.use: to pay for construction costs and to purchase construction materials such as window frames, planks of wood and nails.

loans.name: Khawla

texts.en: Khawla is a 39-year-old married female from Al Karak in Jordan. She requested a 600 JOD loan to buy clothes to resell for her friends and neighbors in the same of area. In the future, Khawla is planning to expand her project and increase her income in order to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons, Ayat prefers that her photo is not on the Internet; thus, the above photo is of her husband. Ayat is a 21-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan who has two family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy ingredients for the project that she wants to develop making cheeses and yogurt to sell. In the future, Ayat hopes to expand her project by opening a shop to increase her family's income. Since Ayat is under 30, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making cheeses and yogurt to sell

loans.name: Gadier

texts.en: Gadier is a 39-year-old married woman who has 4 family members from Al Salt Al Balqa Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy clothes such as bridal gowns and dresses to resell to her friends and neighbors. She hopes to expand her project by opening a shop. She also hopes to increase her income to continue her sons' education.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Muna

texts.en: Muna is a 50-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan who has seven family members. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to pay for her home improvements. Muna wants to do some home maintenance and to buy some household items. In the future, she would like to repaint her home and to buy new furniture.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en: Nadia is a 34-year-old married woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan who has two family members. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 JOD to pay for her home improvements. Nadia wants to buy a refrigerator and electronic appliances. She hopes in the future to provide a good environment in which to live.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Faten

texts.en:
Due to cultural reasons, Faten prefers that her photo is not on the Internet; thus, the above photo is of her mother. Faten is a 28-year-old woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan who has two family members. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to pay for her home improvements. 

Faten wants to do home maintenance and to buy new furniture: she also wants to do kitchen maintenance. In the future, she hopes to buy new electronic appliances and a new home, and also to decorate her new home.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Kagera Group

texts.en:
Mary, who is in her early 40s, is married and lives together with her husband and two children (a boy and a girl) one who attends school while the other one has completed schooling.  Mary has been running her local restaurant (mama lishe) for four years now. She works from 8 am to 6 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. Mary used the previous loans to increase her charcoal stock by purchasing more sacks to sell, covering her household expenses, and she has successfully repaid all her loans.

Mary hopes for a loan to replace old items like plates and chairs in her mama lishe business in order to make the business attractive as well as to attract more customers. Her dream is to one day be able to buy a plot of land and build her own house.

Mary will share this loan with her loan group " Kagera" which totals 11 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to replace old items like plates and chairs in her mama lishe (local restaurant)

loans.name: Maysa

texts.en: Maysa is a 41-year-old married woman with five children who is from Al Zarqa in Jordan. She has requested a 600 JOD loan to pay for her home improvement and painting expenses. in the future, Maysa is planning to do further home improvements and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvement and painting expenses

loans.name: Amal

texts.en: Amal is a 40-year-old married female from Al Zarqa in Jordan. She has four children and requested a 600 JOD (Jordan dinar) loan to pay for her home-improvement expenses and to buy some furniture. In the future, Amal is planning to do further improvements to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for her home-improvement expenses.

loans.name: Tagried

texts.en:
Tagried is a 27-year-old married woman who has 2 family members from Al Hashmi Amman Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 450 JOD to buy clothes for children and women to resell to her friends and neighbors. She wants to increase her product offering. In the future she hopes to expand her project by opening a shop and she wants to increase her family income.
 
Since Tagried is under 30, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Naimat

texts.en: Naimat is a 55-year-old married woman who has 4 family members from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She wants to repaint her home and do maintenance on the kitchen. In the future she hopes to add a garden behind her home. Also, she hopes to add another floor for her son.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Rabyeh

texts.en: Rabyeh is a 34-year-old married female from Al Nasser in Jordan. She has 3 children and requested a 500 JOD loan to pay for her home improvement and painting expenses and to do some renovations to the kitchen. In the future, Rabyeh is planning to buy her own home.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvement expenses

loans.name: Najah

texts.en: Najah is a 32-year-old married woman with two children who is from Al Aqaba in Jordan. She has requested a 400 JOD loan to pay for ingredients for making pastries so she can sell them. In the future, Najah is planning to expand her project by selling some grocery items and renting a small shop. Najah is looking forward to improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for ingredients for making pastries

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Due to cultural reasons Zainab prefers that her photo is not on the Internet; thus the above photo is of her daughter.

Zainab is a 51-year-old widow from Ashrafia in Jordan. She has 7 children and has requested a 700 JOD loan to pay for clothes and other goods to sell. In the future, Zainab is planning to expand her project and to have some salesmen working with her in order to increase income and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for clothing and other goods to sell

loans.name: Kawthar

texts.en: Due to cultural reasons Kawthar prefers that her photo is not on the Internet; thus the above photo is of her husband. Kawthar is a 35 year old married woman who has 4 family members from Jarash Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for her home improvements she want to repainting her home and to do maintenance of the home. She hopes in the future to provide for her family a good environment to live in.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Miasar

loans.name: Elmer Americo

texts.es:
Elmer tiene 23 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Santiago, el cual se caracteriza por que se desarrolla la agricultura en especial se cultiva algodón, uva, entre otros. Elmer es un joven muy trabajador, sobre todo porque con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, Elmer trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y poder brindarle algo mejor a su familia. 

Elmer esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar los tramites para obtener su licencia de conducir ya que sufrió un robo y perdió todo sus documentos, de esta manera el podrá conducir con todos los permisos en regla y seguir luchando para poder conseguir hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa de material noble”.
texts.en:
Elmer is twenty-three years old and lives in the district of Santiago, an area that is characterized by farming and development, and in particular, the cultivation of cotton and grapes, among others.  Elmer is a hard-working man so that he can support his parents and their home expenses with the fruit of his labor.  

Elmer works as a moto-taxi driver.  He works about ten hours a day and can serve twenty customers daily.  He believes that his work is going well because he is kind to his customers and above all, he has a lot of drive to continue moving forward and to offer something better to his family.

Elmer is very thankful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to the help that has been offered to him, he will be able to cover the expenses to get his driver's license, since he was robbed and lost all of his documents.  He will be able to legally drive and continue fighting to be able to realize his biggest dream: "to finish building his house of higher-quality material."

loans.use: to cover expenses for replacing his stolen driver's license.

loans.name: Brenda Lucia

texts.es: La joven Brenda, es soltera sin hijos labora como docente de secundaria desde hace 10 años para una escuela, es una mujer que ama su profesión de docencia impartiendo el pan de la enseñanza a niños campesinos de la comunidad, es una persona que ha lidiado por un porvenir mejor. Solicita su quinto crédito para invertirlo en compra de materiales de construcción para poder realizar un anexo a su vivienda. Su mayor sueño en la vida es gozar de mejores condiciones en su hogar, tener estabilidad laboral para seguir haciendo mejoras y poder pagar sus cuotas y que su familia goce de salud, con el préstamo comprara cemento, bloques, arena, hierro, alambre y pagara la mano de obra.
texts.en: Young Brenda is single and doesn't have children. She has been working as a middle school teacher for the past ten years. She's a woman who loves teaching and sharing the gift of knowledge with local peasant children. She's someone who has struggled towards a better future. She requests her fifth loan in order to invest in the purchase of construction supplies so that she can build an addition to her house. Her biggest dream in life is improving her living conditions; having work stability in order to keep on making progress; being able to repay the loan; and seeing her family enjoy good health. With the loan she'll purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron and wire, and she'll pay for labor.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron and wire, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, cinder blocks, sand, iron, wire, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Pedro Andres

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 57 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente Pedro no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos, y en algunas ocasiones aprovecha la oportunidad para comer un riquísimo Ceviche con sus amigos. 
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años Pedro trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño ya que se siente a gusto realizando su labor.
Pedro se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que él desea poder realizar los acabos de los servicios higiénicos, tanto en la puesta de servicios, pintado y puesta de piso; de esta manera Pedro tendrá su hogar en mejores condiciones, adecuadas, seguras y salubres, que brinden mayor bienestar para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 57-year-old single man who lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago.  He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person with a strong desire to succeed.  Unfortunately, Pedro was not able to study for a professional career as, from a very young age, he had to work to help his parents with the household expenses.  In his free time he likes playing football with his friends and neighbours, and occasionally takes the opportunity to eat a delicious ceviche [a seafood dish] with his friends.

For a number of years Pedro has worked as a labourer on a farm in his city.  Every day, in the very early hours of the morning, he begins his work and can work for about 12 hours.  He believes that his business is going well due to his hard work, as he enjoys his job. 

Pedro is very grateful to Kiva lenders, as with the help he receives he will be able to make improvements to his home.  He wants to be able to finish off his bathroom by installing a toilet, painting and laying flooring.  This will mean that Pedro's home will be in a better, adequate, safe and healthy condition, which will improve his own and his family's well-being.

loans.use: To carry out improvements to his home.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es:
Don Fidel tiene tres hijos mayores de edad a quienes dio crecer con su trabajo como contador para una empresa privada pero con el tiempo se dedico a taxear y ahora lleva 20 años desempeñándose en esa labor, su esposa ama de casa. Don Fidel con este crédito solicitado desea poner el cielo raso de su casa y poco a poco la ira reparando para darles como herencia a sus nietos para que lo recuerden siempre, con el crédito comprara láminas de plycem y materiales para el marco. 
Su plan a futuro es poner un comedor como negocio y no andar en las calles manejando de lo cual ya está cansado de este oficio ya que es bien desgastante y a veces hasta peligroso.
texts.en:
Fidel has three adult children. He was able to raise them with the support of his job as an accountant for a private business. However, over time, he began to work as a taxi driver and now has twenty years of experience with this work. His wife takes care of the home. Fidel is requesting this loan because he wants to put up a false ceiling in his home. Little by little, he works on repairing his home so his grandchildren can inherit it and remember him by it. With this loan, he will buy sheets of Plycem, a type of cement fiberboard, and materials for a doorframe.

His plan for the future is to open an eatery as a business instead of driving a taxi on the streets. He is tired of this work because it wears him out and, sometimes, it is dangerous.

loans.use: to buy sheets of Plycem and materials for a doorframe.

loans.name: Raúl

texts.es: El Señor  Raúl tiene la edad de 28 años esta casado con la Señora Rocío tienen 2 hijos los cuales están estudiando en primaria en esta ocasión esta solicitando el segundo crédito porque invertir en la tienda de abarrotes ya que le esta haciendo falta mas mercancía. Es por eso que esta solicitando un crédito para surtir su negocio  y así puedan cubrir todas la necesidades que sus clientes.  Su esposa y El se encargan de atender el negocio en diferentes horarios ya que el cuenta con un empleo extra esta muy agradecido con el apoyo  que a tenido. Con las ganancias obtenidas de las ventas del negocio será para pagar el crédito ya que con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo será para los gastos familiares y escolares.
texts.en:
Raul is 28 years old, he is married with Rocio and they have 2 children who attend primary school.
He is currently asking for his second loan because he needs to invest it in his grocery store because he is very low on merchandise.  With this loan he will supply the store, and therefore be able to cover all the needs of his clients.  He and his wife run the shop at different times of day because he has a second job. Raul is deeply grateful for the support he has received.  With the sales from his store he will be able to pay back the loan, and with his salary from his other job he pays for household expenses and his children's school.

loans.use: Compra de mercancía para el negocio de abarrotes

Sobeyda ha demostrado capacidad y voluntad de pago, esta agradecida con Afodenic y Kiva, su mayor sueño es tener su casa bonita y agradable, lo cual la hará sentirse mejor.
texts.en:
Sobeyda, a resident of zone 2 of Nueva Guinea, is married, and the mother of a child. She also works as a teacher for a school. 

She is requesting her first loan in order to make improvements on her home. Therefore, to build a bedroom in her house she needs to buy sand, cement, cinder blocks, iron, and gravel, and pay for labor. Her main goal is to have better conditions in her home. Sobeyda has demonstrated ability and willingness to repay. She is grateful to Afodenic and Kiva. 

Her biggest dream is to have a beautiful and pleasant home, which will make her feel better.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, cinder blocks, iron, and gravel, and to pay for labor.
